title: Build Battle
description:
Build Battle is a very creative building game, it has the classic gameplay in Blockman GO. With imagination, players turn required theme into a construction work within a prescribed time. And then competes with the works of other players to determine the winner.
Here are the rules for this game:
- There will be 8 players. After the game starts, they will be transferred to their respective rooms.
- A theme will be set by system automatically. The player needs to complete the construction within the prescribed time according to the theme.
- When time is up, players will be transferred to other players' room to grade works.
- The player with the highest score will be the winner of this game.

This game is owned by Blockman GO. Download Blockman GO to play more interesting games.
If you have any reports or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at indiegames@sandboxol.com

title: Miami Craft: Blocky City Building Addicting Games
description:
Welcome to Miami! City of luxury, crazy parties and addicting games. Enjoy the newest crafting & building games hit! Play Miami Craft for free!

Welcome to the Party City!
What do you prefer? Beach party or yachting? Why not both? Travel by miami metro, ride a supercar or explore the ocean! But behave well. It’s not a Miami Vice! City needs you in good shape to party all night long on the famous Ocean Drive! Don’t wait any longer and join the fun!

Play fun minigames
If exploration sounds boring, treat yourself with one of our fun minigames! Play one of funny music games, sing like a rockstar or make dance floor hot! Line to date you will be miles long! Enjoy one of the best games for girls and boys! Play Miami Craft for free and fist fight with annoying wrestlers to be king of the city!

Fall in love with Miami Beach
Miami is an extraordinary city. Exploration is a key part of Miami Craft, so go out and fly helicopter to the party or your private yacht! As you get there, what’s better than chatting and dating! Games like this will also let you dress up like a model or great businessman! Party along with your girlfriend, boyfriend or love of your life! Are you ready to write your own love story in the blocky city?

Explorer & city builder!
Miami Craft is one of the best combination of exploration games, dating games and city building games! Party never ends in Miami but think hot to design the most epic place in the blocky world and... build it! Build a house, build a city of your dreams and enjoy advanced Crafting & Building mode the way you like! You can destroy everything and rebuild it as you want! Play the most addicting games, play Miami Craft – for free!

Miami Craft FEATURES:
👙Crafting & Building mode. An advanced tool for every fan of crafting and… building things.
👙Fly your own helicopter, ride a car or throw a party on the yacht!
👙Fun minigames. Try your luck in the most addicting games!
👙Party in Miami! Chat and date with boys and girls. Find a boyfriend or girlfriend or… love of your life!
👙Blocky graphics. See the amazing world of craft!

Fly a helicopter, ride a super car or find a motorcycle and go on adventure of your life! Take a boyfriend or girlfriend on a romantic date or throw a party on the beach! Play the most exciting crafting & building games for girls and boys of 2018!

Play Miami Craft for free and enjoy the world of never ending fun! Feel the tide going through the crafting games and play one of the most addicting games of 2018!

title: Dark Parables: The Thief and the Tinderbox
description:
Play the trial for FREE!  Pay once & complete the adventure!

The Kingdom is set for a royal wedding, but someone isn’t happy about this special occasion. Wildfires are raging through the forests, threatening to destroy the entire countryside. In order to stop this arsonist, you’ll have to venture deep into the woods and locate a magical artifact that was stolen long ago. Your job will be anything but easy, as you unlock the secrets of the past in this exciting hidden object adventure!

• BE CAREFUL WHAT YOU WISH FOR!
Who is behind these deadly fires, and why do they want so badly to stop this wedding? Could this be tied to a witch who cursed the thief that stole her tinderbox?

• CAN TRUE LOVE SAVE THE KINGDOM?
Sort through this tangled love story in a land filled with vibrant hidden object scenes.
	
• STOP THE ARSONIST BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE
Find this treacherous thief by solving fantastical puzzles and mysterious mini-games.

• DEFEAT A LEGENDARY ENEMY IN THE THRILLING BONUS CHAPTER
Protect the Snow Kingdom and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Puzzle Pieces, morphing objects, and more!

• Test your skills through a variety of puzzles, mini games, and amazing hidden object scenes!
• Immerse yourself in a fantastic story full of colorful characters and intriguing locations!
• Unlock the full game to gain access to incredible bonus content and additional gameplay!

title: Block Puzzle
description:
Block Puzzle is a very fun block game. Block Puzzle has more game modes.
New Energy Mode is simple and addictive, To crush any block will generate energy and fly into the energy bottle. 
When the energy bottle is full, you can get a chance to rotate the pending blocks.
Let’s enjoy this block puzzle game.

FEATURES OF BLOCK PUZZLE
- Easy To Play, Lots of fun
- Energy Mode is very addictive
- Exquisite pond style
- When the blocks are crushed, the surrounding fish will be disturbed and run away
- Cool animations and Game Scene
- The game progress is automatically saved，so you can replay it anytime
- Suitable for all ages With Beginner's guide
- No wifi needed, you can play it anywhere
- Support leaderboards and No time limits

HOW TO PLAY BLOCK PUZZLE
- In Energy Mode, the blocks can be rotated when energy bottle is full
- In Other Modes, the blocks can not be rotated
- Drag the blocks into the grid and to fill rows or columns


Let’s Enjoy This Block Puzzle Game.

title: Amber's Airline - High Hopes ✈️
description:
Fasten your seat belt and take off with Amber Hope in a new airline game!

From GameHouse, makers of Delicious, Fabulous and Heart’s Medicine, comes a brand new time management adventure that will make your heart soar!

In Amber’s Airline - High Hopes, you’ll get a taste of the glamorous life of a flight attendant. 

Meet Amber Hope, aspiring stewardess for Snuggford Airlines. Amber has dreamed of flying to exotic destinations around the world since she was a girl. But before she can join the elite crew of air hostesses, she’ll need to pass her exams. That’s not going to be easy, and she’ll need your help.

✈️Be transported by a truly wonderful story of love and loss
✈️Fly through 60 travel-themed levels, and 30 extra challenging levels
✈️Explore the world and get a behind-the scenes look at airport life with 6 unique locations
✈️Master 18 mini games that cover every aspect of flying – from check-in to security checks, suitcases to passports, safety demonstrations to serving passengers
✈️Fasten your seatbelt for amazing, all-new cinematics
✈️Experience what it’s like to be a real flight attendant - the ups and the downs
✈️”Unfasten” Amber’s diary and discover her secret thoughts as you earn game goals
✈️Customize Amber’s diary by earning diamonds and make it your own with travel stickers and different covers

Amber’s life seems wonderful. She shares her apartment with her pet fish, Sushi. She loves her job and dreams of the day she’ll be on an airplane, a full-fledged cabin attendant assisting travellers. The possibilities are endless - “the sky is the limit” as they say. But appearances can be deceiving…

Everything is overshadowed by what happened in her childhood and she can’t escape her past. Her lingering guilt and fear are holding her back from achieving the very thing she is trying to achieve. 

When her plane crashes, Amber is forced to face her fears. As you’ve heard time and again during safety demonstrations, Amber will have to help herself before she can help others. Is she up to the task?

Share the highs and lows of Amber’s life. Be there for her and help her ascend to the highest heights!

Try the first few levels for free! Then choose to unlock the full game with an in-app purchase, or subscribe for a free trial of our subscription plan!

*NEW!* Enjoy all GameHouse Original Stories with a subscription! As long as you’re a member, you can play all of your favorite story games. Relive past stories and fall in love with new ones. It’s all possible with a GameHouse Original Stories subscription. Subscribe today!

Follow Amber on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

title: Sweet Candy Farm with magic Bubbles and Puzzles
description:
Relax in a magic paradise, where sweet dreams always come true, and free candy grows in the garden. Harvest delicious crops every day!
Use your harvest to craft dozens of different treats. We've got all the recipes you need: lollipop, hot chocolate, birthday cake and much more. Kids love it! Then sell your goods to neighboring lands. Cookie castle, Jelly village and Cake town all crave for candy, it's a great oportunity for business!
Build a zoo and Invite lovely pets to your farm. Sheep in this magic land prefer bubble gum to the regular hay. Feed them, and get soft marshmallow in return!
Friendly neighbors will be happy to help you bring your farm to the top. Join the little princess on her journey! Help her find her baby brother, the prince, and master the art of sweet magic in the process. Give the Marshmallow fairy a friendly advice on how to approach her crush. Many funny stories await you, write your own fairy tale.
Try the 2018 release from Foranj games, a new farming simulator coming to USA. Enlist the support of your family and friends and build your own fantasy township!

Join our group on Facebook to tell your story:
https://www.facebook.com/Sweet-Candy-Farm-Community-195277887916581/

title: Idle Flippy Knife
description:
Idle Flippy Knife is a simple and relaxed game! Now tons of colorful bubbles are waiting for you to click. Just have a try, you will enjoy endless fun!🎉🎉🎉

The goal is pretty simple!
🎯Crush bubbles as many as possible with the audio and rhythm of music
🎯Earn more coins to get cool weapon and knives

Now start your journey with Idle Flippy Knife😍
1. Turn on the screen to break the first bubble
2. Click "collect" to get coins
3. These coins can be used to unlock or upgrade weapon and knife
4. Unlock weapons and knife to improve the ability to increase damage
Tips：Knives are available only when you are STRONG

Features👏
❤Easy to operate
❤It is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time
❤Upgrades various abilities to increase damage
❤Various kinds of weapons
❤Experience the best destructive physics game on your phone

Are you ready?💪
Aim and crush all the bubbles and explore thousands of amazing puzzles and surprises!🙈
Hurry up! Break the bubble on GOOGLE PLAY!✨

If you have any suggestions, please contact us.
Feedback from players always makes us happy! 
❤ Your Idle Flippy Knife team❤

title: Oliver the Virtual Cat
description:
Meet Oliver, the virtual cat. Take care of Oliver and make him part of your everyday life just like a real life cat. 

Oliver the Virtual Cat is hands down the best virtual pet game on the market, with more content than any other pet game. 

FEATURES

Multiplayer: Play with up to 4 friends in real-time!
Mining Game: Explore and mine through a whole world!
Platform Game: A complete platform game inside the pet game!
Mini-games: Play one of the 50 mini-games and earn money!
Life-like emotions: Oliver will get happy, sleepy & sad depending on how you treat him.
Nurture: Take care of Oliver by feeding, cleaning, playing with and getting him to sleep when he is tired.
Customize: Dress and choose from over 1.000.000 combinations of dresses, shirts, hats, beards & glasses.
Build: Build the house of your dreams by choosing wallpapers, furnitures and decorations. 
Garden: Grow your own flowers, flesh-eating plants and mushrooms in the adorable garden.
Stickers: Find and collect lots of virtual stickers of Oliver doing silly things! 
Cards: Unlock collectable and beautiful cards of Oliver! 
Music: Create music with the virtual instruments such as: piano, drums & guitar. 
Cat evolution: Combine small cats and watch them evolve!
Fish evolution: Travel under the sea and discover thrilling sea creature and breed them!
Paint: Draw beautiful images with over 18 different colors and share them with your friends.
Building Blocks: Play with building blocks and create your own castle. 
Aquarium: Take care for fishes and style your own aquarium.

What are you waiting for?! Download your own pet today, it is free!

title: Dances For Battle Royale: Learn How To Dance
description:
Do you want to learn how to dance the floss and take the l? Maybe Orange justice? have you mastered any yet? Wait no more, now you can learn to dance every single fortnite dance and you can also check other people dancing the best fort nite dances and be the judge deciding how good they are.

How this game works?
First, pick a category then select if you want to learn how to dance or just to watch people dancing the emotes, this is the fortnight youtuber challenge, every category is a meme dance, six dances have been included in this dance version, we have picked the most funny and famous. The floss, best mates, jubilation, orange justice , fresh and take the l.

Once you have selected one (most of the videos are little clips and short funny vines or gifs) and decide if they did well or not, you can also smash or pass the funny videos ! Moreover there are 3 marker challenge and slime videos soon.

Play now on the following modes:
- Battle royale mode: watch the best fornite dances and decide if the quality of the dances, did thanos dance well? Would you rather this or that?
- Dame tu cosita mode: be the judge on this genius dance, fun is guaranteed !

Be prepared, in our next update you will be able to update your own videos, will you roast yourself and upload yours? Stay tuned ! Lwiay !

Remember , you can also play this game like the classic you laugh you lose challenge, just press like button if you laugh !

Be careful as you play because there are many surprises in the game Or are you ready to dance the shiggy challenge anytime the game ask for it? 

We really hope you enjoy playing our game the same we did mean making it.

title: Magic Bubble Pop
description:
A brand new witch game is casting a spell in the store! Download Magic Bubble Pop and enjoy fun bubbles game full of amazing charms and boosting potions. Help the wizard to fire and shoot bubbles and win challenging levels. Once you start popping bubbles, you are bewitched! 

Take a trip to wonderland and encounter more than thousands of magical levels filled with mystery and fun! Magic Bubble Pop is a fun bubble shooting game with awesome features, beautiful effects, and cool boosts and power-ups. Join the wizard game and pop all the balls by matching 3 colors - You don’t need to use your spells for this quest!

Try out this cool and challenging game, aim carefully to hit the target and make these bubbles pop! Get it now for FREE and experience easy and fun gameplay. Use your bubble popping skills to shoot, burst, and blast all the colorful balls and clear levels. 
This challenging game is super addicting!

Magic Bubble Pop bubble shooter game features:
* An easy to play and enchanting experience at the wondrous magic land full of spells. 
* Discover great levels packed with surprises and puzzles.
* Pop, crush and explode bubbles by matching at least 3 colors. 
* Pop and fire all the balloons with a limited number of shots in each level. 
* Bubble swap is free.
* Colorful graphics and designs.
* Smooth gameplay and cool animations.
* Completely free-to-play online or offline, hours of fun are guaranteed!


Play through thousands of exciting magical puzzle quest levels and enjoy the most amazing gameplay anywhere and anytime, with no wifi and no internet required. Compete against friends and family and see who can reach the highest score and get 3 stars on every level. 

How to play this epic puzzle adventure:
* Show off your color matching skills and complete all the blasting missions. 
* Reach the level target and solve the fun puzzle to advance.
* Aim and tap where you want to shoot.
* Match, burst, and explode 3 or more bubbles of the same color to create a line blast and win coins. 
* Reach the goal on every bubble shooter game level, and gain charming gifts. 
* The more balloons you remove from the board in one shot, the higher score you’ll get. 

Boost your experience with special power-ups:
* Pop and crush 7 bubbles in a row to collect the FIREBALL that will burn every bubble on the way.
* Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a BOMB that will take out surrounding bubbles.

Try out the best bubble shooter game and experience a simple yet addictive magical game. Join the epic adventure, and don’t forget to bring your wand along! 
There is no life or time limit - you can play any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited. 

Have a blast shooting and smashing all the witchy bubbles. It’s so easy to play this wizard world game!

All rights of Bubble Shooter ™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.

title: Washington Craft: 🇺🇸 Blocky Building Games 2018
description:
Independence Day is coming and you’re the president of the United States! Better find good words to give a presidential speech! Build your own White House and explore blocky Washington in one of the best blocky building games! Crafting & building fun – only in Washington Craft!🇺🇸

Build a house or... The White House!
Become a professional house builder! Create a whole pixel and blocky world in an American style. Ever wonder what’s like to redesign Washington Monument? Now you can because you’re a real city builder! Exploration is a wonderful experience. Washington Metro is great but don’t forget you’re the POTUS and Secret Service can’t let you use it instead of presidential limousine.

An ultimate builder of capital city!
Sandbox world meets crafting and mining – that’s why pixel games are so creative. Consider yourself a real crafter and use blocks to design real Washington Monument, the White House or Washington Wizards! Explore the infinite blocky world! Buildings are the piece of art in blocky games like Washington Craft! It’s time for your custom design. And if it’s boring push the red button and start from scratch! At last, you’re a POTUS!

Play minigames!
Washington Wizards need you! It’s your builder base where you can find a lot of blocky fun in cool minigames. Exploration and huge adventure could be exhausting, so enjoy beautiful minigame maps. Build an empire of blocky entertainment and take exploration craft to a new level!

Date boys & girls!
Find a boyfriend or girlfriend in the city of love and power! Look for friends or pick up girls and boys to chat and meet them in romantic places like Lincoln Memorial, The White House or Washington Metro. The helicopter is waiting!

Party time!
Best blocky building games for girls and boys let you have a great time! Organize a real presidential ball in the White House or take your friends to the water park or go on the rollercoaster ride! Be not only the best city builder but also a mastermind of fun! Leave home, take a helicopter and party in the whole city!

Explore the infinite world!
You can travel anywhere you want! Ride cars, helicopter, trains or craft a perfect vehicle for your own in one of the best city building games! Do whatever you dream of like crafting & building Washington Wizards Arena. Play the addicting games for free!

Build anything you want!
If your imagination is limitless and blocky building & crafting games are your favourite, you should challenge yourself as a city builder of Washington Wizards Arena or new White House. Find out what addicting games for free have to offer. See beautiful fireworks during Independence Day and fall in love with the Washington Monument. But don’t go anywhere without Secret Service agents! POTUS can’t do it!

Washington Craft features:
🇺🇸The White House – it’s your house since you’re president of the United States!
🇺🇸Washington Monument – visit the symbol of capital city!
🇺🇸Classic crafting & building gameplay!
🇺🇸Sandbox mode – no borders, no limits!
🇺🇸Love story in the romantic scenery of the White House!

Let’s play a real crafting game!
No time to wait – enjoy the best addicting games for free. Use your blocky building skills and become a real city builder. Find a date, take care of custom design, experience sandbox and story mode. One of the most exciting city building games!

🇺🇸Washington Craft – one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE and enjoy the power of the president of the United States!

title: Daily Pinball
description:
Daily Pinball is a free casual game. It is easy but addictive.
 
In the game, you only need to swipe your finger horizontally to aim the blocks, let go and launch all the waiting balls from above, and easily break all the bricks! Make good use of the props to increase the number and power of the ball and try to prevent the bricks from reaching the top. Act together and become the pinball master!

Game Features:
【Real Physics Engine】Real pinball physics engine brings an extraordinary pinball experience.
【Rich Props】A variety of random props make the game more fun.
【Fantasy Game Effects】The bricks are ever-changing colors, and the pinball effects are fantastic and beautiful. Do not blink.
【Full-age adaptation】Everyone can play and loves to play anytime, anywhere.

Download Daily Pinball and start the challenge now!

title: Monster Fishing Legends
description:
​For millions of years, the oceans have been home to giant sea monsters. To this day, they’ve been nothing more than stuff of legends. Do you have what it takes to sail the open seas in search of the truth? 

Go toe to toe with sugar-crazed eels taller than skyscrapers, marvel at a giant sentient mutant driftwood, catch a mermaid moose using cream filled candies and get a terrifying hydra to pose for the local news! 

Sail mystical seas in search of legendary creatures in this monster catching game! With a simple one tap gameplay, sailors of all ages can begin this adventure. 

Be prepared to skillfully lure and reel in dozens of unique sea monsters. Watch out for wild underwater streams or they'll take your bait for a ride! Get your sea legs ready as the further out you go, the tougher the monsters will be! 

As the world’s premier monster hunter, it’s your duty to uncover the truth behind the mysteries. All hands on deck! Time to go Monster Fishing!

title: Cookie Wars
description:
Jelly Walkers have taken over the Cookie World, 
Gather the Cookies and fight to survive! 

Savor scrumptious gameplays and real-time PvP! 
Let the battle of Cookies begin! 

■ EASY DRAG & DROP CONTROLS! 
Quick to learn and easy to play! Anyone can enjoy Cookie Wars! 

■ DIVE INTO THE WORLD OF COOKIES! 
Meet the cute and diverse inhabitants of the Cookie World! Collect them all to build the strongest team!

Stickman Racer Road Draw 2 Heroes is a sequel to the legendary game of survival, where to make incredible tricks, driving different transport and getting into different crash! The game is made in the best traditions of simulator games with ragdoll physics elements. Make incredible jumps and tricks and destroy the enemy! Your task is make the finish alive or dead! 

 Stickman Racer Road Draw 2 Heroes is one of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving game ever made!
It is the next generation of endless car racing. 
In this game, you are god of the roads and you will rule the roads.

Start the engine! True hardcore is coming!
You will have to drive different vehicles plating for the stickman, again and again jumping and crashing into the walls! You are not allowed to stop, drive fast! Break and destroy more transport to win! Once you skip a beat, you lose the game! Stickman can ride a bicycle, a bus; drive a sport car!

The fans of stickman games will be absolutely thrilled!
Create a true hardcore together with the stickman! 
Participate and watch real destruction!

Are you ready to break the laws of physics?
Each level includes new tricks and new crash! You can choose new types of transport! Do you want to feel the strongest one among stickman all over the world? Will you survive in conditions of constant risk? Will you be able to react to bear the blow and destroy the opponent? 

This is the best simulator among stickman games free! 
Gather speed and crash into the ragdoll stickman!

Open new levels!

title: Chic Wedding Salon
description:
Planning a wedding can be really hard. Become a wedding planner and be part of a beautiful story in one of the cutest wedding games for girls!

Enter the makeup salon with our bride and apply eyeliner, lipstick, mascara and other products. Match her makeup with her nails. Create a lovely manicure using pastel colors and sparkly decorations. Wedding games are the coolest games for girls!

The bride is a little picky, so her gown must be chosen carefully. All types of dresses are waiting for you, browse through them all and decide which one goes perfect on our girl. Complete her look with a flower bouquet and a bride veil. 

After the bride dress up, it's the groom's turn. Fashion it's not his thing, but he is counting on you! Create the perfect wedding suit by combing shirts, pants and jackets. An adorable bow tie it's a must!

One of the most important things at every wedding, the one that everyone will talk about, it's the ring! Design a ravishing and unique ring for our bride! 

What's a wedding without a bridesmaid? Play dress up with the sweet doll and choose an elegant outfit from her wardrobe full of colorful dresses, skirts, blouses and many more. Do your best in one of the newest wedding games! Take photos and keep all the memories in an album! 

Chic Wedding Salon game features:
💐 a gorgeous bride, a handsome groom and a cute bridesmaid
💐 6 levels including makeup, dress up, nails
💐 a special level where you can design your own wedding ring
💐 over 460 fashion items
💐 fun and safe for kids of all ages

If you love wedding games, then what are you waiting for? Get Chic Wedding Salon and help these lovebirds prepare for their wedding day!

description:
Jewel & Gems Blast, tap 2 more gem cubes, solve puzzles, blast jewels.
There was an accident, and someone stole his jewels while the suslik was asleep.    
Will you use your hands to help the suslik find his gem?
Raise your finger, simple tap tap the screen, with the most fascinating puzzles.
Burst cubes and create powerful combos to solve puzzles then pass levels.
Solve puzzles with suslik's help of boosters and create your gem legend. 

HIGHTLIGHTS IN GEMS BLAST
Easy and wonderful game that anyone can play it.
Well-designed levels,dozens of entertaining obstacles make the game more challenging
Puzzles solving is fun and also can train your brain.
Pass level and collect stars you can get more free gifts.
You can enjoy cubes crushing game anytime and anywhere,as long as you have a mobile phone.
Eye-catching interfacial design and stunning graphics.
Spectacular elimination effects of boosters and special elements:rocket,bomb and colorful butterfly.
Spellbinding gameplay and cute character suslik who can dig diamond to get gifit for you.

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap 2 neighboring gem cubes with same color to crush them.
- Tap 5 more gems to make special rocket that can smash a column or a row of squares.
- Tap 7 more gems to make special bomb,the purpose of bomb is to burst the large area squares.
- Tap 11more gems to make special butterfly that can blast all same color cubes.
- Boost power-ups to help you pass level when you get into tricky levels.


Jewel & Gems Blast is free to download, and free to play, so why don’t you give it a try today!

title: April Coloring
description:
Treat yourself with hundreds of paint-by-number kits hidden inside this relaxing and calming game full of art, positive energy and good memories.

Its features include smooth coloring, a plethora of high-detailed, quality content and a unique experience system allowing you to unlock more pictures as you progress.

Whether you’re looking to relax after a busy day at work, pass the time as you commute, or share some fun with your child, April is the perfect solution for you.

If you’ve ever enjoyed coloring, you will definitely fall in love with April!

Key Features:

+ 120 illustrations
+ Leveling system for unlocking new content 
+ Social media sharing
+ Time-lapse after finished painting
+ Daily content

title: Diamonds Time - Free Match3 Games & Puzzle Game
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Bellows Farm, heir! Parents' home and an incredible garden welcome you here!

'Diamonds Time' is a new popular Match3 game. Match explosive gems, precious crystals, diamonds, treasures and gather collections. Complete quests and open portals. It's more fun than rearranging delicious sweets and candies, cropsies and fruits, or jams and cookies.

Solve all in-game mysteries, secrets, and brain-teasers, assemble all Match 3 puzzles. Play online free, meet heroes and make friends.

What is waiting for you here: the king and his medieval city, the Venetian pirate, dragons, the clockmaker, the astronomer and his aquarium, the underwater world and its secrets, the Valley of Magicians and a mysterious cat, the Treasure Island, the favourite Manor and the gardener - the guardian of Bellows' secrets. Fun is here for everyone: boys, girls, adults, and children.

Here you'll find:
- Characters and people who are passionate about the game;
- Quests, events, and adventures in space and time;
- PvP competitions;
- Communities and competitions between communities.

What is waiting for you here:
- Stunning graphics and sound;
- Your favourite Match3 genre;
- Thousands of fascinating levels;
- Precious stones and COLLECTIONS!


Let's start adventures with the Bellows family in best match 3 game!

'Diamonds Time' is an entirely free game. However, you can purchase some in-game items for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features*

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support.tvm@playme8.ru

title: Hello! Fish: Cat Fisherman
description:
\(=ﾟ·ﾟ=)ﾉ Story is beginning...🎬🎬🎬
Hello everyone, I am a dream kitten. I want to get rich by fishing. 😻Meow ~
Come and explore with me. Feeling the joy of catching fish.✨

\(=?·?=)ﾉ Tell you my fishing tips secretly😝​😝​😝​
 Just slide your finger to catch fish.
🚢 There are many fish groups under my boat. Ready to catch them to earn coins and upgrade a big nice ship. Opps… more & more fish is coming!🐠
🗺 Everyone has own dream to travel the mysterious ocean. My footprint has been recorded on my map. Don't forget to open it. Follow me!🚩
🐱 Of course, I'm not alone. I have many friends. But they only come out till you catch enough fish and diamonds. Aright, I hope you can see me often because I'm a fishing talent!🎊
🎁 Actually, to be a talent, more coins you have, more props you can upgrade and surprises you will explore.Come and catch the fish with me!🎣


\(=$·$=)ﾉ Are you ready?🎈🎈🎈
Look!These are my fish🐳🐋🐟!

title: Lego Pixel Ninja 2D
description:
Do you like playing a very challenging casual game? would you like to prove that you are the best gamer among your freinds ?
LEGO Pixel Ninjago 2D is the perfect game for that, this is one of those easy to play hard to master games, this pixel ninja go 2D looks easy but it's really harder than you think.

No hints or tips just jump with your Lego Ninja and Go kill the villain birds.

How To Play Lego Pixel Ninja 2D:
• Tap the button on the right to jump.
• While you are jumping click the Left button for the Ninja to jump a little bit higher or to kill the flying bird.
• While you are jumping click the right button for the Ninja to Go down fast in the ninja way and bounce over the walking bird that will make you jump even higher and killing it.
• Try not to let your Lego Ninja Pixel to touch the monster birds or you will get killed and lost.

More Ninjago characters will be added to the game.

Download LEGO Pixel Ninja 2D NOW, one of the best casual endless challenging games now for FREE, enjoy and challenge your friends!

title: Paris Love Craft: Romance, Flirt & Chat Games 2018
description:
Can you imagine your first kiss in the top of the Eiffel Tower? Play Paris Love Craft and write a perfect love story! Prepare for a date, flirt with boyfriends and girlfriends in the romantic scenery of beautiful city! Download Paris Love Craft for free!

Meet the people!
Would you like to attend the biggest party in the world? Flirt and chat to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! After party, find a way out with your french boyfriend or girlfriend and together go to the museum by night, have a picnic on the Avenue des Champs-Élysées and admire the romantic scenery for your love story!

Love choices are everywhere!
Do you dream about high school romance? Be ready for a love story of your life! Flirt and chat with friendly bots and become the real citizen of a Square Paris made of blocks! Have a French boyfriend or girlfriend and explore the infinite sandbox blocky world! Go together on an adventure and drive cars, visit Paris Zoo or design the Eiffel Tower from the scratch!

Fall in love at first sight!
What if you could call “my first love” this handsome French boyfriend? He could be your high school romance or campus crush! Think about your first kiss – adorable! Flirt, play Paris Love Craft and have fun with French girls and French boyfriend! Love wheel keeps moving! Are you fortunate with your love choices? Even if not, you can always write a beautiful love story playing Paris Love Craft! For girls and boys with a dream!

Visit makeup salon for girls!
Love at first sight? Love wheel is unpredictable but you should find time for yourself! Go with your friends to the hairdresser, spa and makeup salon to be relaxed and look fabulous! Make up games for girls and boys are pure fun. You will look spectacular when you meet your first crush! Fall in love with make up games!

Dress up for your first date!
At least you’re in the capital of fashion! Play the best dress up games for girls and boys! Go on a shopping and buy a beautiful dress or an elegant suit! It’s important to look good during your first date! Put on a makeup, wear perfect shoes and meet your campus crush under the Eiffel Tower. High school romance is all that you need!

Paris Love Craft features:
❤️ First kiss on the top of Eiffel Tower!
❤️ Love story with a French boyfriend or girlfriend!
❤️ Flirt and chat with the happy people!
❤️ Meet your first crush!

❤️ Play the best teen love flirting games!

Don’t wait and play funny flirting games for girls and boys! Flirt and chat with a French boyfriend or girlfriend, go to a party or drive cars all day. It’s the best combination of dating games, high school romance games and dress up games you’ve ever played!

Download Paris Love Craft for free and start to believe in love at first sight!

title: Upgrade The Game 3
description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS CURRENTLY ON BETA. It will be full released on September, 20th

After the success of Upgrade the game 2 with more than 1 million of downloads, Upgrade the game 3 game has been upgraded to the next level!

This is a 3D game where your goal is to upgrade the game from scratch to a beautiful game, including sounds, graphics, interfaces...EVERYTHING!. 

In order to keep upgrading the game, you will lead 5 ships in the battle to destroy the enemy in this space shooter.  Collecting the upgrade material that you need for your upgrades. There are more than 8 ships to choose and combine as you wish in order to save the galaxy!

Use the ultimate skill to make devastating attacks!

Enjoy the special attacks to gain an incredible power for a limited time!


Upgrade the game 3 FEATURES:

-Two gameplay modes!

-More than 150 levels with a background story where you will investigate who is behind the "lose" of upgrades.  

-More than 8 ships to choose and combine. Each one with his own ultimate skill

-New special attack mode, where you will gain an incredible power for a limited time

-4 different special attacks

-Increase the power of all of your ships

-More than 25 different enemies

-More than 60 different upgrades  with more than 4 levels 

-Upgrades for the music, graphics, sounds, interfaces, FX... for everything!

-Different perpectives of your ships during the gameplay

-15 Planets to explore 

-Hangar where you will be able to see your ships closer


www.suduck.com
https://www.facebook.com/suduckgames
https://twitter.com/SuduckGames

description:
Hello friends of Bubble Blast™ and welcome to the newest edition of this amazing puzzle game that you've been waiting for.

The little coloured bubbles are back in a new game that mixes reflection and relax.
Explode them for creating chain reactions and get coins that will allow you to unlock multiple surprises, playing Mini-games and even 
go in a lunar expedition!

New obstacles will appear on your way the further you go progress in the game.
But never lose faith in your capacities to solve these levels, and try to be the first in the world ranking!

In the Bubble Blast™ schedule:
• More than 2000 original levels
• 3 Game modes to unlock
• Amazing Mini-Games
• Many different bubbles
• A World Ranking for the Arcade Mode
• a mysterious space mission 
• And of course...lots of fun !

change your ideas by joining the wonderful universe of Bubble Blast™ Legacy.
Download and play ! It's free !

title: High School Couple - First Date Makeover
description:
Dress up and make up a teenage girl for a romantic date, then pick an outfit, a hairstyle and facial features for the boy, too. Or, if you feel more like it, style these cute young lovers for a typical college day: in highschool uniforms, jackets, shirts and such. Give the girls a smart, geeky look, like they'd go into math or computers. Or pick a more formal style for an abitious student type which plans a career in business. Or put together a cool glam look of a popular girl in the class, with trendy clothes, fancy hairstyles and unusual accessories worthy of a prom queen. Dressing up the boybriend is as fun as the girlfriend with a stylish selection of garments. Design great outfits for the cute model and her crush.

Press the "Camera" button to grab screenshots of your fashion designs, then share the pictures with your friends to show off your fashionista talents! If you love digital makeovers and virtual doll cosplay, press the "More games" button and download other dressup apps to your Android device. Young fashionistas enjoy our beauty salon games becuase they're truly free: no in-app purchases, no locks, and hundreds of apparel articles to choose from.

title: Hidden Object Adventure: Mermaids Of Atlantis
description:
Go on an awesome Hidden Object adventure to Atlantis and beyond as you find hidden objects, complete quests, collect items, and uncover treasures! The mermaids are waiting to play!

UPDATE 17th Sept: Added 40 stunning new underwater levels for you to explore!

FUN HIDDEN OBJECT GAMEPLAY
Hunt for hidden objects scattered throughout each level, collect useful items, complete quests, earn huge rewards, and meet fun characters on your hidden object journey! Zoom in on the scenes to help find tricky objects, and ask Fiona the helpful Fairy for hints if you get stuck. 

COLLECT HUNDREDS OF UNIQUE TREASURES
Gather items on your adventure and add them to your treasure collection. You'll receive a big reward every time you complete a collection of five items. Rewards will give you even more items to add to your collection – it's a treasure hunter's dream!

================
MAIN FEATURES:
================
★ Collect hundreds of unique items and get rewards for completing collections
★ Zoom in on the beautiful HD images to uncover those hard to find objects
★ Meet interesting characters and complete quests
★ Travel through a variety of beautiful lands with different themes
★ Find hidden objects by Picture, Shadow and Mirror modes
★ Complete daily challenges from the Treasure Goblin
★ Collect hundreds of different Creatures
★ Earn prizes by digging for treasure our fun minigame
★ Get tips from Fiona the Fairy, your witty guide
★ Use powerful Rings to help find objects
★ Collect increasing Daily Rewards for free
★ Use Potions for lasting effects that help your progress
★ Replay levels in harder modes to earn more rewards
★ Earn free Coins from the Magical Coin Globe
★ A free app with no internet connection required to play

MEET WONDERFUL CHARACTERS

title: Blossom Garden Blast
description:
blossom garden blast

Fall in love with this sweet new Match 3 flower puzzle game! Get it now for free and discover hundreds of challenging puzzle levels filled with awesome boosters, amazing graphics and lovely flowers. Spend a relaxing day at the lovely flower garden, swap the flowers and win! 

Set on this amazing quest now! Swap and link the flowers and complete missions. Unlock amazing boosters and other surprises to help you on your journey.

Features:
✿ Fascinating graphics and beautiful spectacular boosters, splendid HD colorful graphics!
✿ There are many boosters help gardener also florist designing beautiful flower bouquet in colorful flower shop.
✿ Crush, smash, and blast the flowers with special bonuses that will help you pass difficult levels.
✿ Explore Over900+ well-designed free levels in the amazing flower games and you will never feel bored with this game.
✿ Collect 3 stars and get special prizes in the most addictive match three game ever!
✿ Easy and to learn, and completely addictive!

✿ match 3 or more flowers to win points.
✿ Complete the missions set at the beginning of each new level.

✿ After you fulfill all the requirements in game level, you can move on to the next level.

title: Draw In Tap
description:
Draw In Tap is a good time-killer game,it’s easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.you only just press and hold the screen and release it.also its so cute because there are so many funny animals and lovely pictures.

What are you waiting for?let's collect these lovely pictures.
Draw a line, stroke the edges, collect pictures, and get all the crowns.

How to Play:
1、Estimate the length of the picture outline
2、Press and hold the screen to draw a line
3、The stars will be awarded depending on how perfect the line covers its outline
4、If the line is too long or too short, you need to try again.
5、Lovely pictures hide in the shape.The more close it closes, the more you can see what the shape really is!

Features:
* All free !
* No Wifi need!No time limit!
* Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age
* So many lovely picture,waiting for you unlock
* Support both Phones and Tablets

it’s a great honor to spend pleasant time with you.

title: Soda Bar Mania
description:
Exploring the mysterious fun world of Soda Bomb, simply slide the rows or columns to match groups of 3 or more same bottle to blast, use unique props and power-ups for the preparation of difficult levels. Come and enjoy hangover in Soda Bar Mania with us!

Features:
- Fantastic soda wonderland, over 99 well-designed FREE levels are waiting for your challenge
- Colorful and vivid soda bottle graphics
- Stunning music and sound effects
- No time limit
- Play anywhere and anytime
- Updates come out all the time

How to play:
- Swap and match more than 3 identical bottles to crush
- Make special bottle combos to help you burst various barriers
- Collect the golden key to help with the tough situation
- Be careful about the obstacles: Chocolate, Ice cube, etc.
- Gather enough bottles to win before you run out of moves

Keep having fun whenever you jump into the bar world!

title: Housescapes
description:
Welcome to the Housecapes! Here, you will work with Harold to create a home of your own. You will decorate your house as you like, build a warm and harmonious family, relive and meet like-minded friends, and you will have a cute pet... When you step into the gate, the wonderful challenge has begun! What are you waiting for? Come and experience this fun!

Game features:

Checkpoint Play: Move adjacent tiles. If there are three or more same tiles connected, the connected tiles are eliminated.

Condition for Pass the game: After completing the task of eliminating tiles, you can pass the level and you will receive a star reward after crossing the border.

Decorate the house: The stars obtained by the customs clearance can be used to open other areas of the house,  repair damaged objects, add new objects, etc.

Funny friends: In the Housecapes, you will meet many interesting people, strict fathers, gentle mothers,  warm neighbors and patient pet doctors...

Lovely pets:  In the Housecapes, you will get a cute pet, this lovely cat will bring a lot of unexpected fun to your life.

description:
Solve the newest hidden object mystery from Big Fish. With over 26 MILLION DOWNLOADS worldwide, Big Fish has the most popular premium games that people love to play. Enjoy stunning graphics, solve compelling mysteries and meet fascinating characters.

Play the trial for FREE!  Pay once & complete the adventure!

Help a town in peril in this fantastic Hidden Object adventure! The city of Hamelin had a problem with rats, so they hired a mysterious musician who promised to clear them out. After this piper performed his task, the town reneged on the deal and refused to pay. So the piper picked up his magic flute and once again began his tune, only this time it wasn’t the rats he led out of town, it was the children! Solve amazing puzzles and mini-games to help the League of Light get to the bottom of this and bring the children back home!

title: Anime High School Couple - First Date Makeover
description:
A new doll styling app where you pick hairstyles, facial features, makeup, apparel and accessories for a Japanese young chick and a guy on their romantic go-out. Rummage through the large wardrobes of both comic characters and try out dozens of fashionable garments: dresses, pants, shorts, tops, skirts and more. Explore options and design all kinds of outfits. E.g. give the pair an intelligent, geeky look with glasses and formal suits or jackets. Or go for the cool popular image. Go glam / classy for a prom queen outfit, and maybe make the guy look like a quarterback of the college baseball team. Be the fashion-, hairstyle- and looks-designer for the young lovers. Fill first date with romance and happiness, and the girl would write a cute love poem in her romantic diary about her crush tonight.

Press "More games" button inside the application to download more Android apps for girls with kawaii anime graphics. In our salon & fashion games, you can decorate moe animatronic characters, cartoonish chibi princesses, Asian highschool students in the traditional short skirts, high heels and sailor school uniforms popular in Japan. Our digital makeovers are great for otakus of Japanese pop culture and cartoon girls with an awesome schoolgirl look. 

Dressing beautiful virtual dolls is fun to an otaku of manga comics and anime figurines, but also to any fashionista and dressup lover.

description:
Kick the Monkey is a fun amazing game. Smash, freeze, send the power to the monkey and release stress. You don't need to have physical objects to release your stress when you have the buddy monkey in your mobile. There are various cool arsenal to hit the monkey. Be careful, monkey can move and change position, there are electric shocks, punches, boxing and many more. Its an interactive action game and you can smash the monkey all around you. Kick the monkey and punch where ever you want and release the stress in a second.
You need to blow off steam even if you think that you are a stress free dude.
Kill the monkey if you can. Kick and Buddy is awesome with lot of options and weapons and all of these weapons are free. Kick games and punch games involve little violence so does kick the monkey. title: Brick Breaker 2: Breakout
description:
Welcome to Brick Breaker 2, an arcade game where you can test your breakout skills in a huge variety of levels. When you play this game, you will get to test your reflexes as you break all bricks and reach the next level. But you have to be wary, if you don’t keep the ball in the game arena, you will lose a life.

There are constant challenges and tasks you have to complete too. This makes each level very rewarding and fun in its own right. You just have to acquire the best possible score and collect the falling items so you can reach those bonuses and take things to the next level. 
The way you play is very simple. You can touch the bottom of the screen in order to touch the ball and control your paddle. Then you have to move your paddle around and keep it afloat as you remove all the bricks from the level. Once you complete the level you will move to a new one.
There are lots of cool powerups in here too. You can manage up to 8 balls at once, not to mention you can have a magnet, missile or fireball powerup. There are also bombs, doors, teleportation, and boss fights too. Plus, you also have the leaderboard that constantly pushes you to become the best at all times. Try out Brick Breaker 2 and get the ultimate breakout experience in the palms of your hands.

Features:
•	Very intuitive breakout game controls
•	Lots of cool powerups like multiball, magnet, missile and fireball
•	Outstanding, unique boss fights
•	Various collectibles for you to gain and use
•	Online leaderboard

title: Tapped Geo
description:
Help tom find his home by solving tap tap fruit puzzles spread across world.

Play variety of addictive tap tap fruit puzzles set by aliens to stop you from helping tom reach his home.
Hundreds of interesting levels on routes interconnected and spread across continents all over the world.

Game starts from southern tip of South America and you progress through paths by completing levels on them. 
Levels on each path are of different kind and progressively challenging.

How to Play:

 - Tap over a fruit to clear all similar fruits in that chain.
 - In each tap, Longer the chain of fruits, higher the score you will get.
 - Plan your strategy to tackle aliens disrupting your game.
 - Clear a chain of ten or more fruits to form special powers.
 - Complete all levels in a path to open a new path with different kind of levels.

There are several unique game modes with individual missions as below:
Classic, Reveal It, Catch the Flag, 64 Fruits, Word Mania, Fruit Mania, 
Spider, Frozen Fruits, Hidden Fruits, Snow Fall,Bring Me Down, Reducing Fruits & Bees.

title: Sailor Cats
description:
The cutest fish-and-grow one tap collecting game!

⭐ From the developers featured on the TOP 10 GOOGLE PLAY INDIE GAMES ⭐

Ahoy, Captain! :D Do you need some chill out time? Wanna play a relaxing but super fun adventure game and collect lots of cute and nerdy things? Great! But careful! Because this little felines with frisky paws will steal and melt your heart in a blink <3

Help your lonely fisher cat on its fishing adventure through becoming the most kawaii pirate in the seven seas! Find furry friends to join its happy fleet, collect rare treasures and discover a-meow-zing new worlds full of crazy creatures and paw-some boats!

OMG wait! Is that a map in a bottle? Someone needs to be rescued! Or maybe it’s a hidden treasure full of adorable costumes and toys to fill our kitty collection! Let’s set sail for this kawaii island!

Hold on tight to the fishing rod with your tiny claws because it’s gonna be a wild run!

-------- FEATURES --------

⭐ Super fun and addictive casual click-and-collect game
⭐ Easy to play - intuitive one-tap controls - tap at the right time to fish new treasures!
⭐ Great for kids, moms, grannies, crazy cat ladies and cool dudes alike :O The whole family can play and enjoy Sailor Cats!
⭐ Open bottles and dress your kitties with more than 150 kigurumis. Collect them all! <3
⭐ Upgrade your ships while fishing wood, coins & shells!
⭐ A whole desert island with different creatures and 8 magnificent landscapes
⭐ 200 geeky relics inspired by historical objects with a link to the Wikipedia - for all the curious cats out there! ;)
⭐ Special monthly offers, kittens and gifts will be added with holidays updates: Autumn, Halloween, Christmas and other limited time events!

- Unique and stunning cute kawaii graphic style <3

--------

Regarding In-App Purchases: 
No additional purchases are needed to finish the game.
⭐ No internet connection needed.

--------

#HINT: Unlock Alpacorn and Cloud! They’re super cool *wink*wink*
Thanks to all of you who supports us through social media! You are awesome and we truly love you! <3

--------

This game is made by a small but passionate young team so we really appreciate your feedback ^-^

We really hope you enjoy our game! We certainly had a blast making it. Even if you didn’t, we’d love to hear from you. Email us at info@platonicgames.com
▶️Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/PlatonicGames
💙Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/PlatonicGames
❤️Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/platonicgames_/

title: My Cat Mimitos 2 – Virtual pet with Minigames
description:
Meet Mimitos now, your new virtual pet! He is a funny and loving cat waiting for your cares.

He needs you to adopt him and look after him. Feed him, play with him, tickle him…! Customize your little Mimitos and make him a unique and lovely cat. Will you keep him healthy and happy? Moreover, there are 9 free funny minigames and a collectible sticker album!

++ HOW TO PLAY “My Cat Mimitos 2 – Virtual Pet with Minigames"++

There are many games about cats and pets, but this is different. The objective is to look after Mimitos as if he was a real one. You have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt our favourite cat and start to play with him!
- Dress him as you prefer, choose his clothes, his complements. You choose! There are more than 100 items to choose.
- Design his home. Choose the furniture, decorate your bedroom, customize your kitchen, and choose the colors of your living room, the pattern on the floor… Use your creativity!
- Get stickers and complete all the pages in the album to get incredible prizes.
- Feed him. You’ve got a lot of food to choose from but… just a clue: he loves vegetables.
- Play with him, tickle him and listen to his meows. Remember he needs cuddles to be happy!
- Wash your little cat and keep him clean and tidy to avoid illnesses.
- Send him to sleep to recover all the energy to play.

Show that you can be a good owner of Mimitos!

++ FREE MINIGAMES ++

This game includes several free and funny Minigames that will allow you to get coins to buy food, clothes and furniture (you can play them also in Flight Mode):

CAT-RUNNER. Run and jump in this frenetic minigame.
CAT-BUBBLES. Explode the bubbles in this super classic minigame.
CAT-BASKET. How many baskets will you score in this sports minigame?
CAT-CAR. Press the accelerator and overtake cars and obstacles.
CAT-SHELL GAME. Don’t lose sight of the bell and find it.
CAT-CROSSY ROAD. Go the farthest you can! But look well before crossing!
CAT-PIANO TILES. Follow the rhythm of our cat. Press the piano tiles and make a beautiful song sound in this musical minigame.
CAT-JUMP TREE. Jump the highest you can jumping from branch to branch.
CAT-TRAIN. You are the engine driver, be careful and don’t crash with other trains!


++SOCIAL WORK FOR PETS – ANIMAL RESCUE++

Like you, we love pets. Mimitos is our favourite one but we are also crazy about dogs, cats and other hairy pets looking for their place in the world.

For that reason we want you to get involved in this project and collaborate together with a NGO protection institution of animals that welcomes, helps and cures abandoned, injured and orphan animals. They also help them have a good life and a better future.

How can you help us with this pet rescue? It’s very simple: For this reason we want you to get involved in this project to collaborate together with a NGO to protect animals that welcomes abandoned, injured, orphan animals and helps them to have a good life and a better future.

How can you help us with the pet rescue? It’s very simple:

Subscribe to Mimitos. We will donate 20% of the income generated by all the subscriptions to help them!

The first week in every month we will inform you about the details of the protection NGO from the game, and how the animals are healthy again and happy thanks to you.

Moreover, with your subscription you will get free stickers every day and coin multipliers in the minigames!

Do you need more help? Want more advice? Visit us in:
http://ebabylongames.com

You can also find us on Facebook http://fb.com/EBabylonGames

Rate “My Cat Mimitos 2 – Virtual pet with MiniGames”, as the best virtual pet game and give us your opinión with a big MEOW!

Thank you very much for enjoying with our little cat free game, the cutest of all! Meow if you like it, Meow meow!

title: LA Police Craft: Block Cop & Robbers Action Games
description:
Evil never sleeps! Be a police officer running thief or block robber in order to remain law and order! Save the city in the newest city building and action games for girls and boys of 2018. Play LA Police Craft FOR FREE!

Become the block cop running thief!
Do you want to catch all the wanted criminals from the blocky roads of cartoony crime city? In this block cop car simulator, you will arrest gangsters, robbers or thief and drive them to jail! Break the rules and play one of the best action games for girls and boys and mega craft of your dreams! Find out why police shooting games are so awesome! But remember – with great police officer power comes great police officer responsibility!

Take control over the justice system!
Find a partner and together go on an adventure in the mega craft city! Use police car simulator mode to explore a whole LA – city of dreams but also a cartoony crime city! Simulator gives you insight into police officer job! You can use handcuffs to arrest the most wanted criminals in the LA city. Don’t let a jail break come true or you’ll be in real troubles! Play mega craft, be a block cop and catch every block robber you can find!

Patrol blocky highway!
The blocky shooter, block robber, blocky thief and block cop – all together driving through the roads of the cartoony crime city! In the LA Police Craft, you are a hero who crime city desperately needs! Catch the most wanted criminals and deliver them right to the police station! Gangsters can’t sleep well with you on the policeman duty!

Jail break went successfully!
You are the only one blocky cop who can fight every blocky robber, blocky thief or criminal! Drive the best blocky cop cars in this cartoony crime city simulator! There’s no time to waste! Call your partner and together catch the mob members and robbers otherwise whole LA will be destroyed. Play LA Police Craft – mega craft where you’re the last blocky cop (with your partner)!

LA city building mode!
Build a house when you finish your job in the crime city. Building of own house was always your dream for a good time. But be prepared to finish city building games in order to protect and to serve! Crafting & building games are the best when you don’t let jail break happen! Build a city of law and order in the best action games for girls and boys of 2018!

Play fun minigames!
As a blocky cop, you are always on duty. However, you need some spare time playing fun minigames in the LA Theme Park! Crafting & building is good for imagination but you can practice your reflex in minigames! LA Police Craft is all about the fun. Catch most wanted criminals and take a while to relax in the Theme Park! Or just ride a police car! Simulator of police officer job in 2018!

LA POLICE CRAFT FEATURES:
🚔Explore the blocky world in order to catch the most wanted criminals!
🚔Crafting & Building mode. Be a city builder or build a house for your own!
🚔Fun minigames. Try your luck in the LA Theme Park, but only there!
🚔Blocky graphics. Beautifully hand-crafted, blocky LA awaits!
🚔Be a cop running thief and protect LA roads in the police car simulator!
🚔The best LA police shooting game and blocky roads game!
🚔Play mega craft in the best action games of 2018!

Get all the wanted criminals behind the prison bars!
Enjoy the best combination of action games, police shooting games and police car simulator! As a blocky cop, you’ll have to protect LA against block robber, blocky thief or the most wanted criminals but it’s worth it!

Play LA Police Craft - one of the best action games of 2018! PLAY FOR FREE and see the triumph of justice!

title: Idle Ninja Dagger: Number Brick Breaker
description:
Forget about all the addictive and time killer games you’ve ever played on your Android device, as Idle Ninja Dagger is going to set the bar to a higher level by not only delivering everything you should expect from such breaker game but by offering great features including smooth and addictive gameplay, high-quality graphics, engaging story and a lot more.

So, if you like playing such number breaker games and looking for an addictive game in this category, download Idle Ninja Dagger for free on your Android device and start popping up the numbers one by one to complete the missions and overcome the challenges. 


Equip yourself with powerful Shurikens and take down the bosses

Shuriken is the Japanese concealed weapon which is known as the most popular weapon used in Ninjutsu. Idle Ninja Dagger gets the most out of the Shuriken and uses them to destroy the bricks. Once you progress and collect more golds, you get to unlock more powerful Shuriken and hit the number brick faster and more destructive. 

There are also different buffs, including speed and power that make your Shuriken even stronger. You can also use the touch attack feature that allows you to click on enemies for faster progress.

Once you get used to the gameplay, you need to be fully focused and decide whether to upgrade your current Shuriken and make it stronger or unlock a new type of Shuriken.


Who should install this breaker type game?

Well, it depends on the type of game you are looking for. If you are one of the following types of players, then Idle Ninja Dagger is going to become your best companion for sure:

One. If you like such breaker games, but are tired of the available number brick games and looking for a new concept in this category.

Two. If you are looking for an easy to learn game to entertain you for hours without noticing the time and getting bored. 

Three. If you are looking for an addictive and time-killer game to play in your spare times. 

Four. If you are into Ninja games and always enjoy playing such ninja games. 

And in overall, if you care about high-quality graphics, along with addictive gameplay and smooth control, then Idle Ninja Dagger won’t disappoint you at all. And since the entire features are available for free, there is no harm giving this breaker game a try. 


Idle Ninja Dagger main features at a glance:

•	Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
•	High-quality graphics with cool sound effects
•	Addictive gameplay with engaging story
•	A perfect time-killer game for your spare time
•	Unlock and upgrade your Shuriken using collected coins
•	Use power-ups and buffs to go even stronger
•	Defeat the bosses to move to the next stage
•	Free to play

So, download Idle Ninja Dagger, the free breaker game with ninja concept, on your Android device, attack the bosses with your Shurikens and finish the challenges one by one.

Stay tuned and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests or any other suggestions.


Twitter -  https://twitter.com/BunkervilGames

title: Fill One Line block 2018
description:
Sharpen your mind with a connect-the-block-style one-line brain training puzzle game.
A simple but addictive fill one line block puzzle game that’s completely free to play.

Your brain becomes more active the more you play.
During your commute, before you sleep… enjoy downtime with brain training.

The rules are extremely simple.
Just fill in all of the blocks using only one line.

Use hints for puzzles that are too hard to solve.
Hints are also free, of course.

FEATURES
★ NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy wood puzzle anytime, anywhere!
★ FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
★ NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Fill One Line Block Puzzle 2018 at your own pace!
★ STUNNING GRAPHICS: catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals suitable for everyone

4 levels of difficulty, with more 2000 games
Don’t get too cozy—the puzzles get harder as you go along.

Mathematical thinking is said to increase work efficiency and prevent aging.
Whether math is your bane or your forte, be sure to give this game a try.
You’re sure to get hooked on these puzzles!

title: New Year Slacking
description:
Happy New Year! It's New Year's Eve and Sarah's family throw a New Year party to celebrate. But her family are all bunch of boring old people that don't know how to have fun, and Sarah is being forced to serve fruit punch. Yawn! Sarah had a great funny year of slacking activities... Can she teach these old grumps a few tricks for New Year?

Using your fingers to complete slacking activities, help Sarah making a New Year party in style! But if have a signal her mom walks over & looks. Close all activities to get back to her fuirt punch!

title: Magic 8 Ball multiversion
description:
This is a simple game version of the magic 8 ball where you ask a question and get an answer in the variation of YES, NO or MAYBE SO.

It also comes with two additional versions. 

TRUTH OR DARE where the magic 8 ball decides for you if you should take TRUTH OR DARE challenge. So your fate depends on the magic 8 ball.

SHOTS DRINKING where the magic 8 ball decides who takes a shot or not and who buys a round.

Gyroscope functions will be added in updates as well as sound, and more variations in the types of 8 ball games.

title: Chibble: Remastered, The Best Match 3 Game.
description:
Chibble is a fun and addictive matching game for kids and adults.

Chibbles are cute little aliens from Betelgeuse that have been stranded on Earth. Your challenge is to match 3 or more Chibbles of the same color to beam them back home.

Earn extra points for matching more than 3 Chibbles and for matching the elusive Rainbow Chibbles.

Sounds easy? It is at first, but watch out for the stubborn Chibbles who don’t want to leave and the giant Chibbles blocking the path home.

Three types of game play are available: Classic, Zen and Speed

title: House Repair Game Idle Building repair Craft
description:
Renovate house by using hammer, mason tools and other contemporary construction tools to enjoy the ultimate experience of house renovation. Buy houses, customize them and sell house for money. A simulator of construction, repairs and design. Do experiments with home design and express your house repair renovation creativity as an interior decorator. build a dream home, repair an old house and sell them.

The game for house designing needs Paint the facade. Clean, and renovate houses with your service! patch the floor and replace broken window panes and Flip new houses as much as you can. Build and decorate your own dream house in a beautiful city Or maybe remove the wall between the kitchen and the living room?

 As a flipper builder, Renovate the interior - choose new house furniture and arrange it as you see fit. Home renovation is an amazing task of all age groups who like such new games 2018. Home new design games and interior decoration keeps users busy and is a good time killer. Design your dream house and renovate it. Fix and flip the walls and place LCD TV on the right place. Paint the walls to decorate the rooms carefully. There is a lot of selection of house furniture, beds, chairs, tables, bath and kitchen furniture, painting and other decor items so Buy, Fix & Flip.
Maintain your happy big house, merge houses and avoid house destruction. Subway Houses are expensive. My home is ready to sell when you finish repair.Love rooms, decorate walls, break the bricks between drawing room and living room. Place candy in the room so that when kids come to see the renovated house, they have something to eat. This is the new house episode for loving family in house frenzy series. There are many house choices and beautiful stories for happy family. There is a garden and plants outside the houses to increase the beauty. run uphill with your construction tools and place TV on the right place. Crush the wall candy will pop for little fun. Switch houses when it needs repair. House with crag  and make good arrangements. Smash the stones and hit the walls to break them. Home makeover is not easy, it requires lot of time and investment. On your last day of renovation, you are very happy as your house is ready to live. Rolling houses too soon will give you lot of money. Star glaxy and sky from rooftop at night with a cup of tea is a cool sight. Hot house sell too soon. 
Buy devastated houses, repair them and upgrade their design. Give them a second life and live in them or sell with profit. Earn a fortune in house flipping.

FEATURES
• Design hundreds of houses,Renovate and style houses in a beautiful 3D design simulation game
• Find fun fixers to flip and renovate faster with new properties appearing
• Watch offers roll in for homes you designed - as a Real Estate House tycoon
• Learn the basics of real estate by paying attention to ‘Neighborhood Comps’
• Specialise in a wide variety of renovation capabilities to unlock more colours and new skills
• Live the life of a real estate investor and start building your portfolio. Buy, fix, and flip for a profit

How to play Pop Pig : Shoot Bubble :
1. Your finger move to the target, aim, and shoot!
2. Match 3 bubbles can clear them.
3. Clear all bubbles the game levels is complete.
4. Match more bubbles to make them burst can get points as bonus.
5. Every color you clear will not appear again.
6. Tap the bubble also can get points as bonus

Let help Angry Mom Pig rescue baby pandas from the bad evil fox - The Witch Evil with so many Magic, and Power. Your quest is shoot bubble to matching them,and be like a dynamite,blast bubbles will beat him to save baby piggies. You must pass thousand challenging levels. During journey , Power-ups and boosters will help you beat boss easier.

Pop Pig Game Features:
1. Classic game with save Little Pigs mode
2. Lots of boosters to enjoy.
3. 200+ levels with uniquely challenging obstacles waiting for you to explore.
4. Cute Little Pigs , colorful bubble, different pop, beautiful music, amazing world map and special effects
5. Laser, The motion board, magic lightning ball and energy channel.
4. Play Free! No Network Required!
5. Fluent shooting experience!

Visit Pepper Woods Game Studio for more games.

Play this Pop Pig game anywhere and anytime ! Don't care you have wifi or not because game doesn't require you always online. You can play it on the street, cookie, in the plane, in the subway, in the car or bus on the road, even in a temple, a school. OK ? Just simply is offline game !

With Pop Pig : Bubble Shooter ball, you can play with your friends, play online games any time with all the friends in the world and your friends.
summary: Shoot the bubbles to rescue baby Piggies! The best Pop Pig Bubble Shooter Game!

title: Tap Fruit Pop
description:
You can tap many fruits like sweet strawberry, green apple, fresh blueberry, juicy orange to crush them.

How to Play Tap Fruit Pop?
● Tap on 2 or more same adjacent fruits to crush them!
● Gather various fruits to pass levels before you run out of moves.
● The more fruits you tap each time, the higher score you will get.
● Use unique boosters and gifts if you meet some hard levels.

How to get boosters:
● Try to click 5 or 6 adjacent fruits to gather a transverse rocket!
● Try clearing 7 or 8 adjacent fruits of the same color to create a bomb.
● Tap on 9 to 12 adjacent same fruits to create a Rainbow Cake, to collapse all fruits of one same color.
● Clear 13 adjacent fruits at the same time for a Rolling Pin.

Features of Tap Fruit Pop:
● Many amazing arsenal of boosters and props.
● Easy to play, challenging to fully mater.
● Compete with friends, break leaderboard records.
● Completely FREE to play.
● More than 500+ levels

title: Nail Art Designs Manicure Studio
description:
Our new nail game has everything that your nails need. Your imagination can design pretty styles so if you like nail art, this free game is the right thing for you. Try different shapes and accessories. Try it, it is easy and fun. Take a picture with your pretty manicure, and share it with everybody. Nail Salon is a free game so do not miss the opportunity to design your dream nails. In your own manicure studio you can create your own nail art design and style. Develop your manicure skills. Inside game you will find many options. Choose different nail shapes, discover many nail polishes, rhinestones, diamonds and stickers for nails. Have fun and share with your friends.

Features:

- Enter your new game
- Explore all the nail polishes
- Play with many colors and accessories
- Use a photo from your gallery, or take a new one
- Play with nails shapes and stickers
- Plenty of styles to choose from
- Save the picture to your phone
- Share your new nails with friends


Become a nail art expert! If you follow nail fashion trends, it is time that you start making your own nail decorations and express yourself in a unique way! There are lots of styles which you can choose, beautiful pastel colors, glitter nail polish and rhinestones. Our photo editor makes this possible, it is very easy! Select the most beautiful virtual nail art. Add the design to your images. Share the new photo montage with your friends. 


Decorate your nails for free right now. This photo editor can make your nails shine and glow. Now you can have the prettiest nails. Everybody will be jealous. Our nail game has a lot of stickers and photo effects that we created just for you. Be creative, explore different design on every nail. Add beautiful decorations on your nails and take a picture. Share it with everybody. Create perfects nails! Our accessories and nail polish bring you fun.

Have you ever wanted to try new, unusual nail styles, but never did? Now you can, without going to a real nail salon and getting an expensive manicure. It is so easy and fun to play with styles and shapes without damaging your nails. Create and design a manicure style that matches your hail and your make up. Pretend that you are a fashion designer. Use all the modern tool from this free game and design your own signature look. 


The world of fashion is changing rapidly, you need to keep up with all the new trends. Start a nail makeover with the effects inside of this program for manicure. Your new game will make your dreams come true. There is a wide variety of stickers and girly accessories for nails, try out all of them! When doing your nails, all you need is imagination and our new nail salon! Simply choose a style that suits you, and you will create a unique nail design in no time. When you are finished making pretty nails, take a picture and share with your friends.

title: Pixel Art - Coloring Game Drawings by Numbers
description:
Enjoy playing this sandbox game of Pixel Art where you can color hundreds of drawings by numbers in a simple and fun way.

Coloring pages by numbers of animals, buildings, anime, superheroes, portraits, castles, flowers, football, arcade, unicorns ... and much more!

Characteristics of Pixel Art:
✔ Suitable for all ages: perfect for adults and children 😃
✔ Save and share your drawings with your friends through Facebook, Instagram ... 🤩
✔ You can create coloring drawings from your own photos by importing them into the app 🤳 
✔ New drawings are added periodically 😍
✔ Game completely free ❤️️❤️️❤️️

How to play?
Very easy! Follow these simple steps:
1.) Choose a drawing or upload one of your photo gallery
2.) Zoom into the drawing with two fingers
3.) Choose the colors you want and paint the drawing

Perfect anti-stress app to spend a fun time coloring beautiful drawings and completing your collection of creations.

Children will learn to relate numbers and colors in a simple and fun way while they play and have a good time. For adults who like to paint and develop their artistic side, this app offers hundreds of images where you can draw with pixels, with various degrees of difficulty to progress little by little and improving your ability.

All your finished or started drawings are saved in "My Works" so you can see them, share them, continue coloring whenever you want.

Create your own drawings to paint by colors, in Pixel Art - Coloring Game Drawings with Numbers you can upload your own photos or images to the app, from your photos you will create drawings in pixels and you can paint all you want!

We hope you enjoy the app and have a good time painting, do not forget to leave your rating!💖💖💖



Note: in order to continue developing free apps we have implemented some ads. Always trying to be as unobtrusive as possible. We hope that they know how to understand and that it is not a nuisance. There is the option to eliminate advertising by contributing within the game. Thanks for the support.

All the images and audios have been taken from different public domain sources (Creative Commons CC0). the images and audios are shown under the principle of fair use.
