title: Sweet Cotton Candy - Food Game
description:
Hello friends! Welcome to Sweet Cotton Candy Food Game. 
We make some fresh and yummy candy with different flavors. Make this sweet dessert by this free game and share with your friends and family. Moreover have fun with making sweet candy with this game. There are many flavors of candy that attracts you while making them with different colors available here and chance to make your own cotton candy whenever you want. You don’t have to wait for carnivals and festivals to eat cotton candy because you can make cotton candy for yourself in this cooking game.
I can not wait to try. Let’s make the giant rainbow cotton candy right now

- First, we need to prepare the cotton candy flavors. Blue, pink, yellow, green, purple. Choose whatever you like to make a very rainbow one.
- Pour the sugar into the cotton candy machine. Pick a stick to make the cotton candy. It’ll be the biggest cotton candy you’ve ever seen

Play an interactive game where you collect the required flavored for this colorful cotton candy. Create the stick for the cotton candy then turn the machine on and add the colorful sugar in. Each color has a different flavor like the purple one tastes as blueberries or the orange one tastes as oranges and so on. Put each layer on to of the stick and when the pyramid is completed just move to the decorating part. You are assigned to be creative and add colorful details and if you would want to you could even put a funny animal character. Is up to you what style you adopt and how many sprinkles you incorporate into your prepared sweets.

- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Start by choosing your favorite dessert to make or making the dessert which the customers ordered
- Take different courses for fruit snow cone, rainbow cotton candy, sweet donuts and frosty milkshake, food wrapping and serving customers
- Try different tools to make your desserts
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your desserts
- Decorate your desserts with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits, cream toppings and bow ties

title: Perfect Wedding Perfect Dress
description:
Everyone wants the perfect wedding day and what bride doesn’t want the perfect wedding dress? You’ll never be disappointed in Prefect Wedding Perfect Dress as we let you live out your wildest wedding dreams time and time again!

Every single detail is all up to you, from the bus for guests to the actual wedding ceremony, you’re in charge, you’re in control!

You want to take out your hens on a party bus? You got it! Together we can make sure it’s the perfect bus as we decide on everything from the food to the upholstery – you want pink seats? You got it!

You know what’s a lot of fun for everyone on a wedding day? Ice cream! In Perfect Wedding Perfect Dress we’ve got a wonderful ice cream van to take care of all your guests’ needs – you can design and create your very own special one off creations that will make your wedding a wonderful, creamy memory for everyone who comes!

Every wedding needs a fabulous menu, so we give you complete control of the restaurant to make whatever culinary masterpieces you want! And remember, it’s not about your guests, it’s all about you. It’s your day, so make it how you want it!

But let’s get to the important stuff – the dress! Whatever your style, we’re here to help. Love frills and lace? We’re on the case! Diamonds and pearls? We have the dress for you girls! Elegance and class? We’re top of the class! 

And we don’t just stop with the dress, we go all the way, making you the perfect hairstyle and helping you choose the right accessories and jewelry to make your wedding ensemble one in a million!

Ad now to the ceremony – you only walk down it once so let’s make sure that aisle is perfect! Pink? Red? Blue? It’s up to you! Line it with flowers, or give it a funky design and cover it in hearts! Then surround it in the most beautiful of flowers and you’re all ready!

title: Two Balls More Walls
description:
Two Balls More Walls, is a simple game which is based on combining and seperating two balls. Main purpose of this game is to avoid the incoming walls.

HOW TO PLAY

1) Open the game and tap anywhere to start.
2) Once game starts, you can do only one thing, and that is tapping. It combine and seperate the balls back and forth.
3) Focus on incoming walls and tap accordingly.
4) Once you crash, game is over. You can go to menu by pressing burger icon or restart by tapping on arrow.
4) And thats it !

Let's see what is your highscore.

Also don't forget to share and comment. That helps to make better games in future.

title: Newlyweds Story of Love Couple
description:
When you carry your love relation for a long time the misunderstanding could be occur. This is the right time to become groom/bride, propose your beautiful girl for the love marriage.

Play the role of a bachelor boy in Newlyweds Story of Love Couple game. Drive your sports car towards the restaurant where your girlfriend is waiting for you a longtime. She is too much angry this time and left the restaurant. Drive your car towards the shop, buy a diamond ring and flowers for your girl. Stop your soul mate, propose in a heroic style and ask her for the happy wedding.

Newlyweds Story of Love Couple game is amazing family game. Your wedding day is nearby so prepare yourself for the unforgettable wedding, go and hire the decorated car for wedding ceremony. Tell your loving bride that everything is going perfectly and sit in the wedding car. Drive your luxury wedding car towards the city church for the marriage ceremony.  

Exchange your rings each other and take wishes from your family members as well as from the relatives for getting weds. Now its responsibility to make your beautiful bride happy. Take your virtual wife towards the hotel in your luxury wedding car, where your friends and colleagues arranged a party for you. Receive wedding wishes and also tell them how much happy you are after the wedding.   

Let go for long drive with your beautiful wife, so drive carefully on the hilly mountain area. Now it’s time to go home, all the family members are waiting for you. Newlyweds Story of Love Couple game contains the fabulous game play for the newly married couple as well as the wedding games lovers.

Newlyweds Story of Love Couple Key Features:

•	Propose your angry girlfriend for marriage. 
•	Play as a groom and get marry with your princess.
•	Drive your sports car as well as your decorated wedding car.
•	Unique and fabulous game play.
•	Receive wishes from the guests, family members and relatives.

title: Super Jewelry Quest Mania
description:
Super Jewelry Quest Mania is the super classic and addictive match 3 game about jewel & gems..of course with lots of excitement!

Discover the secrets of Rune gems and quest the treasure.
Slide, switch and match 3 or more jewels to rock pyramid world.

It's aim is complete the objectives in limited moves or time. Match 3 or more identical jewels. Defeat the Death.

Embark on Super Jewelry Quest Mania journey with exploring fun. Mysterious world and well-designed free levels!

Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface. 


HOW TO PLAY:
- Match 3 more identical jewels quickly and swap colorful jewels.
- You must have the sharpest and fast mind. Learn to use special jewels or props.
- If you have any difficulties in tricky levels you can use power-ups.
- Try your best to make super combinations with super match!
- Less moves, More Stars, Higher scores! Crush all jewels!

title: Ant Crush And Smasher Game
description:
Ant Crush And Smasher Game

Do you like to pass your time by playing some cool games? Are you bored and want to try out something new and something different. How about smashing some dirty looking big ants? In this game there are different types of nasty looking ants, beetles and worms that you will have to smash with your fingers. The more you kill the ants, the better the level that you will reach. There are in all 10 different levels in this game each one being a bit more difficult than the previous. You will become an expert ant killer once you start playing this game. This ant killing game will help you get rid of the fear of ants. There are a lot of ant games but this ant game is the best that you will find. It helps the players to improve reflective skills. Quick eyes - fast hands. Quickly kill many ants, the speed of movement of the ant will be faster and you need faster. 

Features of Ant Crush And Smasher Game
-	10 different levels of various types of insects like ants, cockroaches, beetles etc
-	Speed increases with the different levels.
-	Smash or crust the ants or insects with your fingers.
-	Aesthetic music to get a feel of being inside the game.
There are not just ants in this game. There are also cockroaches, sliding worms, beetles, and other insects in this game. You have to make such that you don’t kill the fly or else you will lose a life. Playing such games helps you remove fear of different insects and you feel more courageous when getting in front of them. The special effects when you smash an ant or any other insect are something that you will appreciate and truly enjoy. Being an ant killer gives you the satisfaction of having crushed some deadly biting ants that so very much scare you. This ant killing game presents you different types of insects besides ants like worms, cockroaches and the like. There are not a lot of ant games on the internet and hence this game is very rare and fun to play. Highly entertaining game. It's so addicting! Experience this killer bug invasion! Smash the ants with your fingers by tapping on them. You can test your tapping speed against different challenges in different worlds in this ant smasher game.  Each Ant has different strengths, you have to tap multiple times to kill them based on energy. 
We appreciate feedback from our users as it helps us improve our game even more. Please rate this game and kindly share it with your friends.

title: Virtual Dentist Games For Kids
description:
Virtual Dentist Games For Kids Story

The most professional and most comprehensive virtual dentist game on google play! You can experience every scene in the Dental Clinic in it,including teeth drilling,teeth cleaning,Dental filling, extraction,tooth replantation,etc. 

Game Features:
- Brand new,completely original,absolutely not a flash game 
- MAX3D design,showing the most realistic oral 
- The most advanced and most professional dental tools 
- Professional dubbing,real experience to be a dentist
- ell-designed after dental professional consulting

In this game,you as a dentist,should help 12 different patients solving their oral problems.In order to the treatment,you need to select a dentist tool very correctly for every oral problem of the patient,and control it very professionally within a specified time.

title: Design & Build with Clay: Crazy Slime Making Fun
description:
Design & Build with Clay is a unique slime toy making simulator game for girls. Nowadays, more and more little boys & girls would like to play with fluffy clay & squishy slime. They will use clay to design everything they like. Today, in our brand new clay toy games for girls, you will have the opportunity to use clay to design something. At the beginning of the clay toys making game, come to choose the thing that you like. We have prepared hamburger, small house and toy car for you in Design & Build with Clay. If you like hamburger & sandwich, then start from the cooking item hamburger. Firstly, come to choose the color you need to use. We will show you the colors on the left of slime maker factory in the selection bar. You need to choose the corresponding ones on the right areas to start toy making process. Design the hamburger being the pro designer & decorator. Make one clay on the panel. Cut it with the knife and then rub it for several times to round shape step by step in Design & Build with Clay.

Put some small fragments on the clay as hamburger scraps with your decoration & designing skills. After that, come to design the inner layers. Choose one red clay or multi colors layers and make it to round shape as unicorn rainbow slime making games. Next step, you need to design green vegetable layer. At last, it will be the layer of chicken and ham parts. You need to use the tools to make some holes on the chicken clay and cut the ham crazy fluffy clay parts to several small square parts. If you have chosen to design small house or toy car, you can use the same methods to design with your architecture skills in Design & Build with Clay. At the end of the game, come to assemble the hamburger, candy house or toy car layer by layer & decorate the table with other food items. Show us your rainbow slime maker DIY design at last with full decoration. 

Design & Build with Clay Features:

1.	Choose one clay thing that you want to design 
2.	Use the clay to design the thing step by step 
3.	Assemble the clay thing and decorate it 
4.	Show us your clay design thing with decoration
 
Design & Build with Clay Gameplay:

1.	Choose one clay thing that you like 
2.	If you choose hamburger, then choose the colors you need to use 
3.	Cut the clay with knife for slime making factory
4.	Rub it for several times to round shape 
5.	Put some small fragments as hamburger scraps
6.	Choose one red clay to make the tomato layer 
7.	Use same method to make the chicken, cheese and ham layer parts 
8.	Assemble every layer to make one whole hamburger
9.	Decorate the table with other food 
10.	Show us your finished clay design

title: Ballify
description:
Ballify in the most annoying hyper-casual game that you'll ever play.

All you have to do is slide the white bar from left-to-right to bounce the balls falling from the top. Avoid the balls from falling into the lava below the white bar.

Try to send as many balls as you can into the voids on both sides to score points.

That's it. It's as simple as it gets.

Have fun! :D

description:
Girl Secret Love Story game is a story of a girl, who shares her first crush love story.
 It is an addictive and fun loving game for all.
Lisa along with her family is going to paris on holiday. 
There she mets her first crush in the city.
He proposed her to go on a date. Play full game and know lisa's secret love story.


Street Fun:
Lets explore the street of Paris. Try different outfits, click selfies with your beloved ones. Have fun with clown. Try different hat, mustache,scarfs and lots of other things.

Museum View:
Lets plan to visit a museum which is old and damaged. Need your help to restore the items of museum and help make it clean.

Treatment View:
Boy has fallen of the first floor and needs and immediate help.Lets help him and be a kind doctor to him.Lets start treatment by removing grass and other stuff from his bodies.
apply antiseptic to the wounds. give pain killers to ease his pain.check if there is any need for plaster or not?

Date View:
Lets have tour in paris. Will eat some healthy snacks and play guitar.

=> Different levels with multiple functionalities.
=> Vivid outfits for the couple.
=> Virtual tour of paris.

description:
Beauty Fashion Model Color Book is a very entertaining game, with loads of beautiful and interesting colors. You can share this game with your friends and relatives. In particular, you can give this game to your children and so you can develop the creativity and imagination of your children.

Relax your mind after hours of tired work and show your talent through the images you have created. Then share your creative images with your friends, colleagues, relatives, ...

This is a game that will bring joy and connection for you, relatives, people around. And you will be the one to connect people around.

* Tap on the paint bucket to select the color and fill.

title: Chinese Girls Makeover - Modern Asian Fashion
description:
Become the ultimate fashion designer for modern urban garment style of the Orient! In this new app for women, teenagers and girls you can fully configure the doll's facial features (eyes, lips, eyebrows and more), select one of 30 diverse hairstyles, and assemble millions of unique outfits from over 250 apparel items and cool accessories.

If you enjoy makeovers, makeup, cosplay and the culture of Eastern Asia, you'll love styling virtual dolls with this great game for young fashionistas. Create a huge variety of unique looks: choose a hairstyle, build up a custom girl face, and then put together your own outfit from an unsanely rich wardrobe with hundreds of items in it!

8 China-themed backgrounds set the tone: big city of the East like Shanghai, the Great Wall, Bhuddist temple, glam shopping mall, an traditional oriental home interior, a park, an ancient bridge, and more. 

The various items let you get creative and make all kinds of female images: trendy, classy, traditional, highschool girl, fancy young woman and more.

Check the "More by Games For Girls" list on Google Play or press the "More Games" button inside the game to download and play many other dressup & beauty apps. All our fashionista and salon games are completely and truly free: with no in-app purchases you can't actually spend any money here. Isn't that amazing? Besides, the games work offline (no internet or wifi needed to play). Just install on your mobile phone or Android tablet and launch!

description:
3D Ball Roller: Sky Rolling 2018 is a challenging game for you to push the limit of your speed as well as your mentality to become a sharp minded. 
It is providing a fantastic and amazing gameplay to race yourself with time. 3D Ball Roller: Sky Rolling 2018 includes accurate physics for rolling. A simple game but hard to play to take yourself till the next and next level. Control the rolling ball and play as long as you want.

title: Princess Mina - My Talking Cat
description:
Here comes another lovely cat which is going to talk to you and become your best friend! This one is coming from the kingdom, and her name is Mina.
 
😸👗🏰TAKE CARE OF MINA😸👗🏰

Download free 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat👑 today and start the adventure with a lady that will very quickly become very dear to you. Once you open the game, you will see the cat dressed in a beautiful pink gown, with crown on her head, and a neat updo. You will need to take care of her so she would be healthy and so you would reach other levels, so make sure that she is never hungry, that she is happy, and that she gets enough sleep.
 
By taking care of virtual pets children will learn to be responsible, so talking animals will benefit the youngest ones and help them to become better people. Also, if you have a toddler at home, it will be interesting for her/him to talk to sweet Princess Mina and hear her repeating every word. One more thing that children can learn from the newest 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 is to keep good hygiene! They will need to take cat to the bathroom and clean her teeth and take her to the shower. By doing that, they will see that they should always be clean and that they should never forget about their hygiene.
 
😸👗🏰STYLE YOUR CAT PET AND HER HOME😸👗🏰
 
The latest 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 game brings so many cool things your way, and you won't be able to stop playing it! Your new virtual friend won't like to wear the same outfit all the time, and that's why her wardrobe is equipped with the best clothes! You can experiment with all of them if you want to, but in order to get them, you will need to have enough coins, and for some items you will have to wait to reach certain levels so you could get them. One of the outfits that your virtual pet can wear is purple dress with wings! She will look like a fairy, and you could combine that with pink flats. Also, she could wear dark blue sweater with beautiful sparkling necklace, and grey high-waisted pants. She will look very beautiful dressed like that for sure, and she could wear different types of dresses, and other clothes too.
 
A lot of cool things are waiting for you in the top 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 game. You can change her hairstyle, you can buy different types of accessories for her, and you can also change the look of her house! Decide if you want a living room that reminds of the bottom of the ocean, the one with space theme, or a romantic one with hearts. As for the bedroom, you could opt for a bed that looks like a castle, or the one with stars! There are a lot of different designs for kitchen, living room, and toilet, as well, and you will have so much fun decorating the house and making it look the way you like the best.
 
In the Princess Mina - My Talking Cat , you can: 
 
→ Talk to the cat and hear her repeating your words
→ Feed Mina and take care of her
→ Change her hairstyle and clothes
→ Decorate Mina's house the way you like
 
In order to buy all of the furniture and clothes, you will need to earn money, and you can do that in a few  ways. First way to earn coins in the latest 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 is by playing mini games! We have prepared some of them for you, and you will have so much fun playing them for sure. Another way is to play with puzzles. At first you will have to put a few pieces together, and then it will get harder and harder, and more challenging as you make a progress. Also, one more way to earn money is when you upgrade to another level, and we have prepared a prize wheel for you too with which you can win additional coins and potions. So, make sure that your virtual cat is always satisfied and complete all of the levels! Also, don't forget to share the popular 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 with your friends and family, and tell them all about it! There is no doubt that you will love using this top talking cat game and that it will very quickly become your favorite.

Decide if you want a living room that reminds of the bottom of the ocean, the one with space theme, or a romantic one with hearts. As for the bedroom, you could opt for a bed that looks like a castle, or the one with stars! There are a lot of different designs for kitchen, living room, and toilet, as well, and you will have so much fun decorating the house and making it look the way you like the best.

In the Princess Mina - My Talking Cat , you can:

→ Talk to the cat and hear her repeating your words
→ Feed Mina and take care of her
→ Change her hairstyle and clothes
→ Decorate Mina's house the way you like

In order to buy all of the furniture and clothes, you will need to earn money, and you can do that in a few ways. First way to earn coins in the latest 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 is by playing mini games! We have prepared some of them for you, and you will have so much fun playing them for sure. Another way is to play with puzzles. At first you will have to put a few pieces together, and then it will get harder and harder, and more challenging as you make a progress. Also, one more way to earn money is when you upgrade to another level, and we have prepared a prize wheel for you too with which you can win additional coins and potions. So, make sure that your virtual cat is always satisfied and complete all of the levels! Also, don't forget to share the popular 👑Princess Mina - My Talking Cat 👑 with your friends and family, and tell them all about it! There is no doubt that you will love using this top talking cat game and that it will very quickly become your favorite.
summary: Become friends with lovely Mina and take care of her

title: Soap Bubble Adventures – Perfect and Fun Challenge
description:
Blow bubble and get past the pipes obstacles to gain points in this classic game.

Soap Bubble Adventures is a casual game. The main idea is to try and avoid popping the "character" bubble.

The bubble bursting will occur if it hits any one of the obstacles. You must avoid this and you must move the bubble by the means of the airflow by tapping and starting a fan.

Features of this bubble game app:
- Option to sign in with your email account
- Share it on the various messaging platform
- Game play hints in this bubble burst game
- Sound option to make game more interesting
- Switch off button to get exit from the app
- Energy bonus and shield bonus 

How to play?

This is one of the challenging bubble games, so you need to play it carefully. Since there's a finite amount of airflow available, you must decide how to use it (by choosing a direction and balancing the horizontal and vertical components).

When playing this bubble game, you can decide how much of the available airflow (force) should be used to speed up or slow down the bubble in the vertical axis and how much to move it left or right in the horizontal one and thus avoid incoming pipe columns in this bubble game download. It all comes to managing airflow angles/directions and making the best decisions in a short amount of time.

Once the bubble passes an obstacle, the score will increase. So blow the bubble in proper way in this bubble adventure. The game has shield and energy bonuses that can be activated by collecting the appropriate objects in this fun bubble game.

The energy bonus provides an increase in acceleration (but not in top speed), while the shield bonus allows the bubble to hit any obstacle but no bubble burst.

The bonus objects appearance rate in this is dependent upon the current score (higher the scores result in bonus objects appearing less often).

In this bubble fun game, obstacles also appear on the screen also dependent upon the score (in their case, they appear more frequently as the score gets higher). Their horizontal movement speed is also higher as the score increases in this bubble challenge.

While the appearance rate and movement speed of bonus objects and obstacles are generally related to the score, there is also a bit of randomness (horizontal location of the bonus objects is randomly chosen between predefined limits; and the horizontal speed of the obstacles is also random, up to a score and obstacles type dependent upper limit).

Soap Bubble Adventures is designed to be over when the bubble "character" pops. It’s one of the unique collecting and bubble games new. 

Connect with us at:
https://www.facebook.com/Soap-Bubble-Adventures-255827365046782/

title: Ice Cream Dessert Shop
description:
Girls, I'm an ice cream lover, I love creating all kinds of ice cream, and I have opened an ice cream shop. I constantly develop more flavors and more creative ice cream, so that every ice cream lover can feel the extraordinary feeling brought by ice cream. Customers who have tasted our ice cream will remember the wonderful taste of ice cream with an endless aftertaste. My customers are all over the world, and ice cream lovers from different ages and countries come here to order a unique ice cream.Girls,please help me entertain these guests and let's make ice cream for them. 

Feature：
1. Determine which the ice cream the customers like. Our customers include a rich man from America, a stylish handsome guys from Africa, a famous models from France, etc., so you must know the type of ice cream they like, and then start making them.
2. DIY creative ice cream.All the ingredients are fresh and pollution-free.Let's feel the refreshing of cuting the fruit and the joy of making ice cubes. You can choose your favorite refrigerator, wok and other tools. Let us immerse ourselves in the good times of creation.
3. Pick a complimentary dessert for the customer. Every ice cream is a unique piece of art, and of course our desserts are also very delicate and popular. 
4. Let's hope the customers feel cool after eating ice cream and fall in love with our ice cream

title: Drink Master
description:
Have you always dreamt of working as a bartender?
Do you consider perfectly poured cocktails and drinks to be your life goal?
Do you always pour beer perfectly into a glass?
Then Drink Master is the game for you!

Become a Drink Master. Pour the liquor and show everyone that you can create the perfect cocktail! Don't forget to add an ice cube.

This extremely simple game (yet addictive!) allows you to mix different colourful drinks into extremely refreshing compositions! Give your fantasy free rein – mixing beer with beer? No problem! 

Your task is to mix drinks perfectly, up to the set limit!

While pouring drinks will be very easy at the beginning, over time (it's a time trial game after all) it may not be possible to match the ideal proportions of a cocktail and nobody will want to drink it. We have many different types of drinks, liquors, beautiful bottles, glasses, ice cubes, as well as cool decorations in store for you, to make your drinks and cocktails look amazing!

And you don’t even need a shaker! All you need is your dexterity!

Every cocktail and bottle featured in the game was inspired by real life – and like every bartender. you will be able to check whether pouring cocktails will be easy for you and the guests will want to drink them, or if you will find it impossible and flip out of frustration.

We have prepared a lot of levels, and in each of them you will mix great cocktails, and their level of difficulty will be constantly increasing! The right mix of beverages poured from colourful bottles with ice cubes will make you a real drink master (and not just some common bartender).

This simple time trial game, which allows you to pour drinks into beautiful glasses, was made for you by Simplicity Games, the most unconventional game developers and authors of the Ski Jump Challenge.

title: Fix It House Repairs: Home Fixing Simulator
description:
Little repairman! Its time now to make amends in the house. Your home is all broken and need repairs. From bedroom to living room, every single furniture items needs fixing in Fix It House Repairs. A unique repairing simulator game for girls where you can learn to fix broken TV, aquarium & carpets in the living room. Broken chairs & table in the kitchen needs fixation as well amends like a pro repairman & mechanic in Fix It House Repairs. Your home bathroom needs some overhaul for proper use. Broken wash tub, roof lights & sink needs fixing in Fix It House Repairs.

As a pro mechanic, you have already repair many super cars & vehicles in the auto service station but this time it will be home based repairing simulator game. Show your engineering & repairman skills along with being the experienced architect of wooden house. Make necessary repairs to show your home neat & clean as brand new. Wash the garage & walking path after picking garbage. Fix It House Repairs will let you choose broken machines all over the house rooms to get them in working again in this repairing simulator games for girls for free.

In this wonderful game, you will have to be in such a wonderful role as a builder who simply needs to repair the house for himself and his family. At your disposal is a huge, but very old multi-story house. Somewhere a window broken, somewhere off the wall the plaster fell off, and the wiring burned out somewhere and you, like a real house master, will have to fix it all, starting with the basement and ending with the attic, because building and repair is very responsible and an interesting lesson. Also you will need to make repairs in all rooms, carefully repair the broken furniture, decorate and paint the walls, and much more.

The home repair game will help you become the best young craftsman and the master of all trades showing designing & decoration skills in the end. Show how to make repairs in the house or apartment, promote the development of attention, wit and imagination, develop other qualities that will undoubtedly be of use to them in the further adult life. Use the whole arsenal of repairing tools of a real builder - brushes and paints, a hammer and nails, a screwdriver and an electric drill. All these tools will help you when playing games like Fix It House Repairs.

To start playing a game about repairing the house you need to download and install Fix It House Repairs to your tablet or phone. Play our game and become the best interior designer of your dream home.

title: Heroes Inc. 2
description:
Welcome to Heroes Inc 2! The new improved superhero management and experimentation simulator game. (Wow that's a mouthful!).

Humanity is under threat of extinction when a meteor crashed into earth and is causing mysterious rifts to open up, spawning monsters all over the earth. The last bastion of humans have gathered in the largest amalgamation of human population - Terrapolis. 

The opening of the rifts has enabled the harvest of Delirum particles and the creation of the metagen humans. You the CEO of Heroes Inc. get to experiment and create with all kinds of superheroes with awesome superpowers to send out to do heroic deeds and vanquish threats that promises to destroy humanity.

Discover materials which you use to experiment on human test subjects that we're pretty sure will succeed in creating super over-powered heroes. There are literally more than 120 heroes which could be created in your lab. 

Build up your headquarters to recruit volunteers, house heroes and staff. Upgrade your labs to make even more super powered heroes. Train them in strength, endurance and even popularity. Rank them up as they rise in fanbase, attack power and endurance.

Heroes Inc. 2 is a zany, hilarious and funky superheroes management simulation game with over 120 unlockable heroes (did we already say 120? yes, 120) which you can train up to vanquish evil monsters.

Game is free to play, offers awesome in app purchases and contains video ads (developers gotta survive right?) Did we mention that the game is free? Yeah it's free.

So what are ya waiting for? Download it now and feel the power in your hands!

Game features:
01. Over 120 crazy zany superheroes to be discovered.
02. Over 130 materials to be collected.
03. Over 120 missions to complete (over and over again).
04. Giant city sized threats to be defeated by your heroes.
05. City wide defense weaponry to be upgraded
06. Build a bustling base of epic heroic proportions
07. Rank up heroes by training them and raising their popularity level.
08. 5 different classes for your heroes to achieve.

How to play bejewel 2018:
- Match 3 or more identical bejewels.

- Match 3 diamonds in a line to eat them.
- Match 4 diamonds to create special lightning jewels blaze. Lightning diamonds blaze can destroy all diamonds in a row or column
- Match 5 diamonds with T or L shape to create special diamonds blast bomb. Diamonds blast bomb can destroy all jewels around it.
- Match 5 diamonds in a line to create special color diamonds rainbow. Color diamonds rainbow can destroy all diamonds with the same kind of selected diamonds.
- Combine 2 special diamonds together a super blast to destroy more diamonds.
- Combine 2 Jewel Match gem 3 together to destroy more jewels.
- Make the bejewel star down to last line to pass the level.
- Reach a specific goal to solve the puzzle

- Match 3 or more jewels to crush Bens jewels

title: Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar
description:
Hello ladies and gentlemen! We present the loveliest 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋! This adorable lady is here to make your life more fun, and it won't pass long time before she becomes your best friend!

👜💅👠TAKE CARE OF VICKI👜💅👠

The latest 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋 brings something totally new your way, and once you start playing this cool game you won't be able to take your hands off of it, because it's so addictive! Talking games make us responsible because we need to take care of someone, so this virtual pet is perfect for both children and adults. You will have to take care of your new friend if you want it to be happy, and it's very easy to see what she needs, because bars in the bottom of the screen will tell you if she needs to eat, use a toilet, or sleep. Hurry up and download free 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋 game today so you could see what it offers. 
 
You will need to check if your virtual friend is satisfied from time to time, and if you get busy, we will send you a notification which will remind you to feed her, or do something else. If you feed Vicki regularly she will be healthy and she will be on a good way of moving to another level, but you will also have to make sure that she is entertained, and that she is clean. If she gets tired, put her to bed, and if you are impatient to wait for her to rest, then watch a video and skip sleeping. As for the levels, you will be able to make a progress in the latest 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋 game, and unlock new cool items! It is certain that you will never get bored of playing with your virtual pet, so don't forget to share this top game with your friends and tell them all about it!
 
👜💅👠STYLE YOUR CAT PET AND HER HOME👜💅👠
 
Everyone loves to change haircuts and outfits in a game, right? That's why we have prepared plenty of different looks for your virtual cat, and she will always be popular regardless of what you dress her in, because we have prepared the best clothes and hairstyles for you! Vicki Superstar could wear medium straight hair with bangs, or she could become blonde and have wavy hair, or wear an updo, the choice is yours! Experiment with all of them if you like, and then get creative with clothes!
 
But there is one thing you should know, not every item will be available right away, and in order to get it, you will have to reach certain level. The same goes for Vicki's house! You can change it the way you like, and make it suit your taste. So many great things are waiting for you in the top 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋 game, so get it as soon as possible and try it today!
 
In the Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar game, you can: 
 
→ Talk to the cat and hear her repeating your words
→ Feed Vicki and take care of her
→ Change her hairstyle and clothes
→ Decorate Vicki's house the way you like
 
The newest 💋Talking Cat - Vicki Superstar💋 game offers a lot of amazing stuff, among which are coloring books, puzzles, and mini games! By playing with them, you will entertain both yourself and the cat, and you will have a lot of fun! Puzzles are great for the youngest ones, because they will teach them to develop logic skills, and also, once you complete a picture, you will get coins with which you will be able to buy clothes and furniture. You could also earn money by playing mini games, and spinning the prize wheel. Talk to your cat, play with it, and every day will be filled with happiness and joy! Vicki Superstar is waiting for you, and she is ready to welcome you into her home!

title: Smokitten Park
description:
Smokitten is a virtual kitten who loves to play but is hooked on cigarettes. Will you help him to quit smoking by distracting him? Tobacco is an addiction that affects millions of people. I’m sure you know at least one person who is impacted by it. Your virtual kitten, Smokitten, has been smoking for a long time and his health is declining day by day, so we’re counting on you to help him kick that nasty habit.
 
– Support your friends and family who smoke and who have the Smokitten app. When a Smokitten user feels like they’re going to break down and have a cigarette, you’ll receive a notification and you’ll be able to send them a personalised support message!
 
– Like other pet games, you’ll have to take care of your virtual pet. Have him try all of the activities to help him blow off steam and take his mind off things. There are mini-games for everyone: idle games, clickers, relaxing games, rhythm games, action games and even a musical game. Smokitten gets bored quickly on his desert island, so the more you play with him, the less he’ll think about smoking. Each cigarette your kitten doesn’t smoke thanks to the mini-games will earn you virtual money to buy plants, trees, and other things to help you personalise your island.
 
- Learn all kinds of useful information about the dangers of smoking (health, environment, the tobacco industry).

title: Electronic Shop Cash Register: Cashier Simulator
description:
Electronic Shop Cash Register is shopping learning app for all spree buying mall simulator games for girls. Experience mega fun day at supermarket and run cash register software at currency counter being the pro bank manager. High School students! You all can learn how to manage money currency as girl cashier at city big mall. Improve your basic number skills like addition & subtraction by playing best cashier games in Electronic Shop Cash Register. This shopping simulator game is combination of real time management games & cashier duty simulator. Have you ever been to the super market with your working mom and busy dad? Ever wanted to run your own supermarket at fashion mall? Make your dreams of owing a supermarket one day come true in Electronic Shop Cash Register. Jump on other side of cash machine store counter to handle currency machine and big city electronic supermarket in best town.

Electronic Shop Cash Register which is pioneers of best cashier games among best fun games 2018. Supermarket store owner! customers had tiring day welcome them to money machine store counter with big smile on face so they get happy vibes from store cashier. Cash register simulator! Master in shopping bill calculation by cashing out customers in best minimum time. Mark your name in big shopping mall as best cashier. You already have done shopping from designer shop, jewelry store and boutique, now rush towards popular electronics shop in the big mall. 

Electronic Shopping mall manager & cashier! Run supermarket cash counter, add shopping cart items price to cash register software to total the final bill of purchased fashion accessories, stuff toys & other grocery items with electric equipment from household to kitchen items after having shopping fun day. Supermarket Cashier pro! Give shopping receipt, take money and give the balance amount back to customers in form of currency notes. Manage a rush of customers waiting in virtual queue to cash out and making payment via ATM credit card & debit card POS machine of their bank. Welcome shopping mall customers with shopping cart at cash counter. Quickly cashing out supermarket customers and do not keep the customers waiting by utilizing shopping mall, customer & money management games experience to master this shopping spree simulator 2018.

Electronic Shop Cash Register Features:

-	Fun Time Management Cash Register simulator! 
-	Serve customers in super market to get rewards!
-	Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payment methods!
-	Unlock supermarket POS Machine to scan items!
-	Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically!

title: BlockColor (Minetest 0.4.16)
description:
BlockColor provides 8 colors and different types of blocks to build your world. It is only creative, it is no Survival, no PvP or no violent.

This game is in development and uses the engine "Minetest Engine", it is possible to install other games compatible with Minetest 0.4.16 by adding them manually in the folder "Games". It is possible to have multiple worlds with the menu.

This version is for demonstration purposes and is not used to replace minetest, but can be use in addition, if you already have minetest 0.4.16 installed on your device. If you have minetest, you can use this application to install Blockcolor in the list of your games, accessible in minetest.

-

If the game crash, you can download apks :

https://github.com/Blockcolor/blockcolor/releases/tag/1.46.7c (SinglePlayer Only)
https://github.com/Blockcolor/BlockColor-Android/releases/tag/1.46.7c ( Online and SinglePlayer)

- 

Minetest Source: https://github.com/minetest/minetest/tree/stable-0.4
Blockcolor Source: https://github.com/Blockcolor/Blockcolor

-

If need help: https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=50&t=20445

title: Mermaid Bubble
description:
mermaid bubble Barbi🐳
adventure across fun game bubble world
mermaid pregnancy
mermaid Barbi rescue fish pop
Mermaid mommy has a newborn baby pregnancy
 help the mermaid to rescue fish baby pregnancy
Cute and lovely mermaid escapes shark attacks. Please help beautiful mermaid. Try to escape shark attack and collect all gifts with mermaid barbi
The ocean holds many secrets and mysteries. Mermaid is the princess Barbi and the greatest treasure of the ocean.
mermaid bubble is an exciting match-3 adventure in the sea world: solve puzzles, unlock secrets
Mermaid is the princess and the greatest treasure of the ocean. She has always liked to collect seashells, swim trying to outrace pirate ships, keep watch over sea stars
The mermaids have been trapped in giant bubbles! It's up to you to adventure through the sea and rescue them. Aim and bust through bubbles to rescue mermaids. Pop your way to the mermaids by matching your fish's color with two or more bubbles of the same color. 
Help Mermaid to clean the sea world from the trash and rescue fish, sea stars and dolphins avoiding dangerous sharks and jelly-fish. Solve ocean puzzles and don’t get caught in pirate nets!
Mermaid was trapped deep in the sea,those life full of happiness and leisure time is now far away from her and became an unreachable dream.She has to fight against those bubbles that trapped her and let them all vanish before she could get out of this trap. Those magic bubbles has some special features,they will vanish once you pop a bubble with same color and connect them together with three or more as a group. Warning,those bubbles keep coming down and get closer and closer to mermaid, if they reach the warning line,the mermaid will never get out,so they must be cleared in a short time and in a limited area!

Features :

* Help Mermaid Little for Barbi to match 3 or more bubbles to pop them
* Clear the map by rescue all the fishes
* Collect stars to re-build islands
* Use boosters to pass tricky levels
* Lot Of levels with unique challenges
* Lucky draw with plenty of gifts
* Amazing maps under the cute mermaid jam ! 
Mermaid treasure match 3 is an exciting match-3 adventure in the sea world: solve puzzles, unlock secrets, collect seashells, rescue fish from glass jars and cans, pop bubbles, save up treasures and get a reward from Princess Mermaid!
Relax to the max! Popping bubbles is a very effective wireless stress relieving game and the bubble-wrap popping sound is very satisfying. 
Let's start a magical adventure with your pretty mermaid to rebuild beautiful islands for am farmers.
If you familiar with egg shooter and classic bubble shooting buster game then you can realize that there are a lot of new things inside Mermaid Bubble Shooter: panda is replaced by cute fishes, witch is replaced by mermaid and the introduction of Poseidon with under the sea map.
Save mermaid now!
best bubble game mermaid this time, let's play together.

title: Horizon Jump
description:
Run through the sky on a colorful, yet crowded road. Switch lanes and jump to avoid the black dots. The green ones create invincible mode, and the red ones delete everything in sight. You can get points by passing the black dots. The more you pass, the faster it goes, and the harder the game gets.

This game is completely random, and infinite. You’ll always be challenged at different levels. Also, it means that this game won’t take up very much space on your phone or computer. 

To move, all you need to do is swipe towards the lane you want to switch to (or click it). To jump, you just tap. 

This game is pretty easy to learn… but hard to master. How far can you go?

title: 202 Jumps - parkour map for mcpe
description:
Parkour map 202 Jumps for MCPE is made for fans of simple and interesting projects. The plot is almost absent - your goal is to reach the end of the field by jumping on blocks. This is a great way to spend time and relax. If you do not like solving puzzles and want to have more "action", then we suggest you download this map for mcpe. The project is characterized by a pleasant design and lack of failures.

Features 202 Jumps:
The creator of the map is an big fan of parkour. The complexity of the project is high. There will be not only jumps, but also puzzles. To reach the end, you will have to overcome many obstacles. Parkour map will require you to work out mechanical actions and a good reaction.

Your character appears in a small room where you click on a Play button. Then you are transported to a room where signs with inscriptions are posted. Read these inscriptions carefully, as they explain the rules of playing this map for Minecraft. For example, the green block allows you to jump 3 times higher, and the blue block accelerates the running speed 3 times.

On the orange block you can't fall or step, otherwise you go to the beginning of the map. Also there are black blocks with the name Checkpoint, which means that if you fall on an orange block you will "reborn" on this block, but not at the beginning. There are other blocks that allow you to fly or perform other functions. Be careful, read the rules, and you can easily win.

Map features:
- Simple and clear rules - signs will help you throughout the game;
- Pleasant design - the colors of the blocks are very different, so that the player doesn't get confused;
- A lot of "checkpoints" - if you become a black block, you do not have to start all over again.

This is an interesting and not very simple map, but which does not require special skills of the game. Launch the map on your smartphone and have fun. The passage will take quite a lot of your time because the corridor is long. You will get a lot of fun.

Creator: DarkPower202

This map work well with MCPE 0.12.1, 0.13.1, 0.14.0, 0.14.1, 0.15.0, 0.15.1, 0.15.8, 0.16.0, 0.17.0 etc.

DISCLAIMER: This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

This App comply with US Copyright law guidelines of “fair use”. If you feel there is a direct copyright or trademark violation that doesn’t follow within the “fair use” guidelines, please contact us directly.

title: My First College Crush Story - My First Love Story
description:
I was in love with a guy for the first time in my life. This was the story of first love of my life.
"My First College Crush Story - My First Love Story" is the story I wrote in my diary. Let's go through that time once again and relive the time of "My First College Crush Story - My First Love Story".


:::::::ATTRACTIONS::::::

💌💑❤️ HEART JIGSAW
It was the first time we saw each other in my college. I liked him.  Play a heart jigsaw puzzle view to make me closer to my crush for the first time.

We exchanged out cellphone numbers and we decided to go on a date.

💌💑❤️ SPA 
As per the "My First College Crush Story - My First Love Story" in my diary,
We decided to meet on weekend. So I took an appointment of a spa. Now help me complete my spa. I will be thankful to you forever for this. 

💌💑❤️ MAKE UP
And today we are meeting as per the "My First College Crush Story - My First Love Story" in my scrapbook,
So I need to look pretty for the first love story of my life. He was my first college crush. Help me taking an appointment in Make up view and assist me in choosing beautiful shades of Eye shades, Eye liners, Lip Sticks, Hairstyle, Eyebrows and other exciting stuff.

  💌💑❤️ DRESS UP
 This is the critical and final portion for the date. It's time to choose right kind of dress and accessories for the date. We have a beautiful range of cloths, shoes or sandals, Scarfs, Bracelets and other stuff for you. Help me choosing the pretty and cute getup for the date.
I am getting ready for my college crush for the first time. So you can understand the feeling.

💌💑❤️ BOY DRESS UP
Make him ready for the date. Help him choosing cloths for date. We must look amazing together tonight.

 And the time arrived for the date with my first college crush and I am all set and ready to meet him. It was first love story of my life and I am very excited. He brought flowers and gift for me. Play flower jigsaw puzzle to make it possible.

Love is in the air...!! 💌💌💌

title: Angry Donald
description:
The donald gets angry after random intervals. To score, hit him while he is angry. 

After some successful hits he will become small and start moving to escape your wrath.

Please be aware, irrelevant hits and misses will help him in escaping your wrath.

title: Milkshake Shop
description:
Craving for a smoothie dessert?  and you know nothing beats milkshakes. Tiddy Games is bringing you with colors of life in this new making game of milkshakes. it allows you to stir, blend and create yummy colorful milkshakes including blueberry, yellow, white, Blue, pink and many other colors. 

Yes! Our new game “Milkshakes Shop” comes in many amazing and beautiful colors along with multiple flavors, it provides you with your own Milkshake shop to provide you with a chance to make and create your milkshakes in your own way. just open this game , start making milkshakes as per the patterns in the record time to get going. This is a treat for your sweet tooth and a test for your taps and patterns.

We have got you covered with tons of things and options for you, so just start blending and make the best milkshakes in the smoothies world.  In this game “Milkshake Shop” take your creativity and time modes and toss your favorite flavors milkshakes together in order to create a yummy milkshake smoothie dessert. 

Featuring unique play modes including time bound and creative mode to take care of all your desserts needs. Milkshake shop is the best dessert making game to take you to a ride of making and cooking. This game will bring your milkshake needs in one game.  Play this unique game and we will allow you to practice your skills in a variety of settings and making techniques. So welcoming you and all the milkshakes lovers with our first of its kind making game.
 
Start the endless fun by making and decorating milkshakes and smoothies according to your best taste and creativity. This game is more fun with a variety of flavors including chocolates, vanilla and strawberry. it includes garnishing items like cream, whipped creams, chocolate bars , candies and crunches. it offers a vast variety of flavors and decorations to get you going. 

In time bound mode once made, this game allows to decorate your Milkshakes to transform them into a sweet, lovely , amazing treat that looks good and also tastes great. Grab the Milkshakes and transform it into something decorative by using the garnishing items. Its fluffy and tasty and will give you the best treat.

Featuring time modes - Bound by time and patterns, Make milkshakes in the specified time as per the patterns to clear the level. This will test your reflexes as well as your taps on the screen.

Milkshakes Shop is the ultimate making and dessert cooking game that comes with the following creamy, amazing, thrilling and exclusive Features:
- Many kinds of colors and flavors including chocolates, vanilla, strawberry etc
- Create the milkshake in the record time as per the pattern
- Garnish items including 
	candies
	flavors
	chocolate pinches
	colors
	jellies
	Decoration 
	whipped cream
- Many ways to customize your cotton candy desserts
- Many amazing and Fun colors and flavors
- Cute and Adorable decorations to top it off
- Tons of ways to mix and match to garnish
- Minutes and Hours of cooking and making fun

The game includes:
- Very simple controls to play
- Complete milkshake experience  
- Simple yet amazing graphics and gameplay
- Sound effects and screen animations
- Variety of garnish and decoration items

Milkshakes are a delight for all seasons and a tropical dessert. let it be the winters movie night, heating summers, a funky weekend, easter holidays or Halloween trick n treat, Thanksgiving or Christmas. Play this game to prepare the most delicious milkshake beverage to give you yummy dessert along with decoration and garnishing items with the best toppings flavors. Blend it and toss it into your glass and garnish it with decorations like whipped cream, chocolates, jellies, candies, and decorations faces.
Even if you're having a fun Friday night hangout with your friends or you're just in for some quick dessert snack, cold beverage mood, this game has it all.

title: Fruit Pixel Art
description:
This pixel coloring book as a pixel art therapy helps you relieve stress and anxiety from reality. Whenever you want to meditate, relax and develop your concentration, just open this app and start drawing. You will find so many free and fascinating pictures in this app, like flowers, animals, and food, which suit for both adults and kids.

Enjoy creating anti-stress pixel art with Fruit Pixel Art App! Fruit Pixel Art is the best app to color by number and draws your modern masterpiece based on the numbers! This Fruit Pixel Art game is popular all over the world for both kids and adults and we provide you with the unlimited coloring pages. Coloring has never been this easy!

Pixel is an amusing Fruit Pixel Art that teaches accuracy and precision, which also helps them develop motor vehicles, introducing numbers and colors for them.
It is an easy way to uncover the painter in the painting according to color by number. As you can sustain painting, you will get a work of art synchronized with it. Creating masterpieces by your own hands and relief your stress.

Fruit Pixel Art created for children which are in the process of developing their skills and knowledge with many interesting pixel pages and number books for coloring.

Excellent features:
- Easy to color: color pages according to the number and highlighted area.
- Time-lapse video: save your masterpiece as short time-lapse video to impress everyone.
- Daily update: new pictures will be updated every day. Get notified to check the new arrival and start coloring. 
- Share with others: share with family and friends on Instagram, Facebook or other social platforms.

Fruit Pixel Art pages are a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, how to use and it will give them the opportunity to work on their fine motor skills.
Trains your concentration and steadiness Or just want to color your own way, practice your drawing and coloring skill.
This is a great activity to practice your drawing skills. It’s also fun for any age to try to finish the drawing. You will always get a harmonic work of art as a result of the coloring process.

title: Summer Mall Shopping Girl: Cash Register Store
description:
Summer Mall Shopping Girl is a unique shopping simulator game for girls. Our shopping games collection is bigger today with one of the newest fashion games called Summer Mall Shopping Girl and there you can go to the mall for a shopping session with your favorite princess. Because she is a true fashionista, she wants a new kind of clothes this summer for her trendy fashion wardrobe, so she decides to go to shopping in the mall and check the last models of dresses, shoes and accessories from designer store’s dresser. Play Summer Mall Shopping Girl

Will be hard to decide what you should shop in so many stores after cash withdrawal from Bank ATM Credit card, because in our virtual mall you will visit the outfit store, the shoe store and of course the accessories store, with various purses, sunglasses, jewelry or hats. There are so many dresses to choose from and all look pretty and nice, but you have a dream model of how your princess wants to be, so you must respect these wishes and buy all those clothes, shoes, purse and accessories. At the end of the shopping games your favorite princess will look gorgeous, her shopping cart will be full for sure and she will be very happy with her new look for this summer in Summer Mall Shopping Girl!

If you want some improvement in Summer Mall Shopping Girl, feel free to write your opinions in the comments and we will try to make all our mall shopping games better for all girls that like summer fashion and also mall shopping. Hey girls! Play as cashier girl and store manager to deal with a rush of customers in shopping mall. Help customers shop for grocery, boutique and fashion items in huge and cool shopping mall game. Enjoy shopping with mall customers, learn to manage time as well as store’s cash register in this shopping mall cashier game.

Summer Mall Shopping Girl not only teaches how to do shopping, but how to handle cash and customers effectively and efficiently. Get ready to become a supermarket cashier girl, assist shoppers in shopping and show your best time management skills. Make payment from your ATM bank debit card.

Summer Mall Shopping Girl features :

-	a virtual mall for shopping games
-	various stores where you can shop the dresses or shoes
-	jewelry store for a real fashionista
-	a store with different accessories like colorful hats or nice sunglasses for fashion games

Once customers have shopped all desired items, take them to the cash counter. Add each item’s price in cash register, make a total bill and generate sales receipt. Receive payment either by cash or credit card from customers and return remaining money change if any precisely. We know you love shopping, let’s see how well you play in this shopping mall cashier simulator game for girls.

Download Summer Mall Shopping Girl, a unique supermarket shopping spree game with lots of levels & challenging environment.

title: KaiBear:KaiPets - City Building Freedom in True 3D
description:
KaiBear: KaiPets - Enter a world where imagination is the limit and exploration is truly rewarding.  In an open-world sandbox environment, explore a vast and beautiful island to collect food, water and hundreds of other items within the world!  Build your city to greatness, design your Kai-City or Kai-Room exactly how you want it and tame the wild  KaiPet(s) you want to grow into a massive creatures! 

Using KaiBear: KaiPet's City Building and Room Building system dubbed The Freedom Building System, you can build a 3D city that you want to build your way!  If building a City is too much, then take a stab at designing your very own Kai-Room!  There are TONS of furniture and decorative pieces to design with! 

From houses to fences, tables and chairs, dressers and lamps and light poles and hay-bales and shields and weapons and the list goes on!  Everything in the world you find can be used to design your City or Room.  With Hundreds of items found throughout exploration, you can build a Massive City or Room the way you like it, in Full 3D!

Raccoons and Owls and Pigs Oh My!  Find one of the four pets roaming around your world and use Taming Berries to try to tame one of these little creatures.  Once tamed, you can tell them to Follow You, stay in your City or Be Free. Also, you can feed them several times a day and watch them grow into Massive creatures! But be sure to keep them fed though, if they get too hungry they'll leave you!  

As an Island Bear (KaiBear), you yourself have four traits to progress in.  Stamina, Strength, Luck and Intelligence! Each one giving you something different, you can grow to be a massive Bear or earn massive amounts of Experience through worldly actions! The best part is, after you've put your points into something, you can easily take them back out and place them into another trait.  So if you're looking to grow into a massive bear, find better loot, move faster through your world experience for more awesome skill points, you will never have to fear putting them in the "wrong" trait.  :D
descriptionHTML:
KaiBear: KaiPets - Enter a world where imagination is the limit and exploration is truly rewarding. In an open-world sandbox environment, explore a vast and beautiful island to collect food, water and hundreds of other items within the world! Build your city to greatness, design your Kai-City or Kai-Room exactly how you want it and tame the wild KaiPet(s) you want to grow into a massive creatures!

Using KaiBear: KaiPet's City Building and Room Building system dubbed The Freedom Building System, you can build a 3D city that you want to build your way! If building a City is too much, then take a stab at designing your very own Kai-Room! There are TONS of furniture and decorative pieces to design with!

From houses to fences, tables and chairs, dressers and lamps and light poles and hay-bales and shields and weapons and the list goes on! Everything in the world you find can be used to design your City or Room. With Hundreds of items found throughout exploration, you can build a Massive City or Room the way you like it, in Full 3D!

Raccoons and Owls and Pigs Oh My! Find one of the four pets roaming around your world and use Taming Berries to try to tame one of these little creatures. Once tamed, you can tell them to Follow You, stay in your City or Be Free. Also, you can feed them several times a day and watch them grow into Massive creatures! But be sure to keep them fed though, if they get too hungry they'll leave you!

As an Island Bear (KaiBear), you yourself have four traits to progress in. Stamina, Strength, Luck and Intelligence! Each one giving you something different, you can grow to be a massive Bear or earn massive amounts of Experience through worldly actions! The best part is, after you've put your points into something, you can easily take them back out and place them into another trait. So if you're looking to grow into a massive bear, find better loot, move faster through your world experience for more awesome skill points, you will never have to fear putting them in the "wrong" trait. :D
summary: Explore! Grow! Design! Build What You Want, How You Want and Where You Want!

title: Card Towers, Knock Them Down!
description:
Card Towers, Knock Them Down!

Forget about patience, solitaire, and even poker :- The best game you can play with a pack of cards is knocking down card towers.

We build the card towers, you knock them down - what could be more fun !

Simply click on the screen to shoot corks at the house of cards, once you have demolished the card tower then we build another one - brilliant.

There are lots of different levels, and different card castles to obliterate, sometimes you are limited on the number of corks you can fire. On other levels there maybe a time limit so you'll need to shoot fast.

Download Card Towers now and have fun knocking down some card houses and card castles.

title: Arch AR
description:
Arch AR – augmented reality application by which you are able to get a view of the Shelter Object (“Sarcophagus”) and Arch of the New Safe Confinement (NSC) of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant directly from your device.

OFFICIAL AR APP OF CHERNOBYL NUCLEAR POWER PLANT

Augmented reality (AR) allows you visualizing objects as if they stand side by side with you. All it takes is to download the application and point a phone at the marker. 

All available online-maps offer you only 2D view of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant site. With the help of our application the ChNPP facilities gain the depth! Rotate objects, change a viewing angle, and take a look inside! Visit the Chernobyl NPP without leaving your room!

Arch AR application is absolutely free for download and use!

The following views are available:
•	External view of the NSC’s Arch;
•	Structure of the Arch in section and structural elements of the NSC;
•	Space under the Arch including the Shelter Object (“Sarcophagus”) erected over the destroyed Unit 4.

Download image target: https://chnpp.gov.ua/images/3d/ChNPP_3D.jpg

title: The Witch in the Forest
description:
The Witch in the Forest is about a young woman who lives in the forest and is mystified by all things magical and natural. One day, however, she meets another young woman living deep in the forest- a real witch!

The Witch in the Forest (TWITF) is centered around Fidelia, a somewhat introverted and socially awkward girl who stumbles upon Jastiline's house one day and befriends her. It's a short kinetic novel about their lives as they prepare for their favorite holiday, Halloween! This visual novel was made in about 20 days for the Yuri Game Jam 2017.

Features:
- The ability to choose between NVL or ADV viewing mode (text over the entire screen or text in a textbox at the bottom of the screen)
- 12,000+ words
- Cute art!

title: Scary Crush
description:
Four different game modes offer a great variety of gaming experiences and unlimited fun. If you wish to compete against people from all over the world – SCARY CRUSH also contains online leaderboards. Try SCARY CRUSH and you won't be disappointed! But be warned: the game can be very addictive!

Normal: solve fun levels with a variety of objectives.  At this time 35 handcrafted levels are included. New levels will be added in the coming updates.

Blitz: a quick two minute game, where your objective is to accumulate as many points as possible

Time challenge: solve levels under time pressure. The game is over when you run out of time.

Relaxed: a relaxed game without any time pressure, if no moves are left you'll lose a live.

* 4 different game modes: Normal, Blitz, Relaxed and Time Challenge

* Fast and fluid game play

* Special pieces and combos

* Online leaderboards for every game mode

machine is an important factor).

description:
Delicious Cake Maker it's a very addictive cooking game for all girls and her friends. Here in this game you can cook more types of cakes, cook food and serve customers quickly if you want to earn maximum profits. This game tests your time and also your resource management skills. 
In this game beautiful Alicia works at her restaurant to meet her clients needs. 
In this serving cooking game you have to prepare the cakes and serve it to all customers in time otherwise you will not be able to pass the level and you will not can upgrade it. 
Help our cute sweety girl Alicia to serve customers on time with her delicious cakes.
Be a good friend and use all the items you have in the kitchen to complete all levels! 
Have fun play this cooking game for girls and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends!
Carefully follow Alice's to make this super-dessert. Complete each step as quickly as possible for make happy the clients because they’re really in a hurry! Enjoy this beautiful bakery cake maker game!

title: Baller!
description:
Baller! is an endless game with amazing stretches of coins to collect. Go through the baskets for bonus points! 

You must avoid the red spikes that will try to stop you, and jump your way through the levels!

Game Features:
- FREE
- Endless arcade style
- Single tap gameplay
- For all ages!
- Get 'Close Calls' to improve your combo multiplier

title: Bubble Match Jewel: Burger
description:
Are you ready to POP & Match bubble fun? Welcome to the wonderful world of adorable bunny in the Bubble Match Jewel: Burger!
The rabbits are very hungry and crave sweet cookies, hamburgers ... only you can help them. Make plans with Bear, Bunny, Berry and your gang to join in on the Bubble Match Jewel: Burger game and explore the world of cookie bubble to collect new food for yourself. Let's start colorful pop bubbles to enjoy the great burgers, cookies!
🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥

FEATURES:
❤ Addictive bubble game with over 200 puzzles free, fun.
❤ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master on each level
❤ Cute picture, deluxe sound, nice interface
❤ Bubble games are suitable for all ages. You can play anywhere, anytime. No wifi needed
❤ Challenge friends to play for exciting rewards

Tip:
❤ Match 3 bubbles of the same color and create the super-powerful magic blast
❤ Clear Jewel can continuously get points as well as bonuses!
❤ Use power-ups to make intelligent moves.

🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥

Download & Play Bubble Match Jewel: Burger to enjoy hundreds of fun puzzles and make your life sweeter! Play your way to winning great free bubble games! If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at: aliceJoshi.2018@gmail.com

title: Stylish Fashion Painting Game
description:
You can color according to the available sample images I create my own or a separate piece. It's so easy that kids can play. The game has a lot of beautiful pictures including costumes, shoes, bags, ...

This game also brings the connection between you and the others. You can invite your friends, colleagues, relatives to join in this game with you. And in particular, through the game, you can discover the talents of his child in the family. Maybe you will discover something you did not expect.

- Simply tap to paint and pinch to zoom on the coloring pages.
- The game is very fun, simple and educational for all ages.
- Various components: dresses, skirts, hair, hats, shirts, shoes, bags, ...
- Many brushes, stickers and colorful palettes for decorating.
- Useful tools for drawing, painting, coloring whatever you want.
- Effects supported after finished artwork.
- Save and share your coloring pages with your family and friends via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram,...

And once you've enjoyed this game, please help us and take a few seconds to rate and write your opinion on Google Play. Your contribution will help us improve and develop new free games.

title: Puppy Loving Day
description:
Hei girls. Do you love puppies? They are very pretty and we're sure than anyone would love to have one as a pet. Today you're gonna take care of an adorable puppy because his master, a beautiful princess, asks you to do this. She loves very much her pet but when it's about groming she wants some help. Would you like to join her and spend a great time with the puppy? 
The puppy is full of mud after playing in the garden, so first of all you should wash him with a lot of water and soap. Next, when his fut is clean, look closely and find all the bugs hiding in his fud and make sure you remove them. After you complete all the spa procedures you can dress up our adorable puppy. Find a cute outfit and some nice accessories.
Have fun and enjoy this new caring pet girl game!

title: Breakfast Cooking
description:
Be the king of sandwiches restaurant empire and make the most delicious juicy sandwich in this super fun time management free cooking fever!

Ultra crazy hungry customers are waiting for you to serve them their sky-high burger or sandwich and fries, steak sandwich, sodas, and desserts! Make & serve yummy sandwiches with beaf, pork, cheese and other sandwiches  and fishburgers of their wish, unlock all three fast food stands and become the masterchef sandwich tycoon! Download Breakfast Cooking - top cooking game for free and prove you're a real crazy star chef! 

FEATURES:

- Intense gameplay and awesome characters!
- Unlock all ingredients from your kitchen: tomato, cucumber, ketchup, mayonnaise, beef steak, and much more!
- 3 different game modes!

CAREER:

- 3 sandwiches cafe stands – Unlock them all to be the best sandwich maker!
- Over 180 challenging levels!
- Crazy super powers and powerups to help you earn more money!

TIME ATTACK:

- Follow the sandwich recipes and make as many best burgers as you can to win great combos & bonuses! Time management game mode will challenge your burger cooking abilities!

FASTFOOD CHEF CHAMPIONSHIP:

- Design your own sky sandwich burger tower and enter the contest to win the big prize!

If you like to play "best cooking games", this new 2018 sandwich making game is the right choice for you! Be the fastest star chef in the world, and serve all the hungry customers that come to your sandwich restaurant! Make your fish burger, cheese sandwich, or some other gourmet dish and fries even juicier with some of the toppings they're looking for! Add onions, pickles, ketchup, mustard, or extra bacon, and make your customers happy!

Breakfast Cooking - Top Cooking Game will turn you into a real star burger and sandwich chef! Unleash the crazy sandwich fever and play this awesome fast-paced restaurant dash game! Take your serving skills to the next level, fill the tasty patty with ham, chilly peppers, lettuce, double cheese, tomatoes, and eggs, and all sorts of tasty meat toppings and other ingredients to prepare the tastiest meal in your sandwich fever kitchen! Just follow the best sandwich recipe your customer gives you, serve your guests the best lunch ever, and run your own happy diner restaurant like a star sandwich maker!

Try out all game modes in our sandwich maker deluxe and join the diner mania! Making sausage sandwich in this breakfast game is fun and addictive! You must make your customers happy with your breakfast meals, so practice your cooking speed in our time attack mode – beat the clock and get a good adrenaline rush! In this sandwich simulator game, your goal is to develop expert culinary skills and make the top menu for your cafe stand out!

If you love to play sandwich making games and fast food restaurant games, this is the right game for you! Prepare delicious meals in the kitchen of your restaurant, and be the best cook in the world! Breakfast Cooking is one of the best time management cooking games for girls! Download this super fun making sandwiches game and go on a crazy restaurant dash right away!

It's yummy sandwich time – in your burger house, only delicious meals, shakes and fries are served! So, all lovers of food making games, if you're looking for good sandwich games, our "burger restaurant" is open for business! Rise to fame as a top sandwich boss & show off your sandwich making skills by getting better and better at managing your cafe!
Make your own sandwich and fries in the most addictive fast food restaurant game on the store, and show that you are the crazy chef in the kitchen! It has never been so fun to play burger cooking games! Engage in this insane sandwich rush and become the sandwich tycoon in the most prestigious fastfood restaurant chain! If you've always wanted to be a cake boss, or a pizza chef, and you love to "make sandwiches", this time attack adventure is the right cooking game for you!
