title: Asteroid miner - idle
description:
It is time. The time to check out the game that can be casual and challenging at the same time. You can play it anywhere, anytime, for how long you wish. 
Build your mining empire and strip those asteroids to the bone. Grow big and powerful to meet new challenges

~~~ FEATURES ~~~

✓ UPGRADE your equipment to maximize your profits
✓ RESEARCH new Technologies and Abilities
✓ 10 different challenges will keep you going for hours
✓ EASY CONTROLS - Play with just one thumb
✓ TAP AWAY, speed up your progress by playing actively OR
✓ LEAN BACK AND RELAX, let your employees do all the work with idle progress
✓ USE powerful ACTIVE SKILLS
✓ PLAY ANYWHERE! - No internet connection needed
✓ READ THROUGH THOUGHTBOX - see it for yourself, you will not be dissapointed
✓ NO PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTED!!! We value your privacy and collect absolutely no personal information

SAY HELLO

I am working hard on improving “Asteroid miner” and make it more entertaining for you. Please feel free to email me for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. If you have enjoyed any feature of my game, do rate it on play store and share among your friends.

title: RPS Arcade
description:
Rock Paper Scissors Arcade is a simple game about managing units as they try to convert each other to their own team. Fling units around to keep the peace! If all rocks, papers, or scissors become extinct, it's game over!

Designed and created by David Han.

Features:
● Beautiful hand drawn pixel graphics,
● Unique Gameplay
● Captivating Sound design
● Simple and intuitive mechanics
● 20 un-lockable secrets and easter eggs.

RPS Arcade contains minimal ads throughout the game. Purchase the 'Remove Ads' item to get the full genuine experience.

title: Eilish - Bellyache - Piano Magic Game
description:
Do usual color annoy you? You want something more spectacular and amusing? Well we are here to help! We created this game to fulfill your wishes. Golden background, multiple songs and smooth gameplay will keep you entertained all the time.

The game itself is simple, just tap on piano keys or slide on longer keys and collect points. Compete with your friends and see who is the best!

title: Ladybugs Flying Dreams
description:
They have traveled a long way and their safety has been laid upon your hands.

The ladybirds only yearn for survival but they have lost their way home! Help them find their own houses in this fun, challenging and engaging game with cute ladybugs!  Wander around beautiful garden mazes as you stimulate your mind with color recognition skills packaged with educational levels!

Ladybugs is a fun and addicting puzzle game for kids not quite.	 The cute little ladybugs are lost and cant find their way back home! You have to help them find their houses. Learn colors and orientation through this challenging and engaging game with cuddly ladybirds. This game will keep your little ones occupied for hours. Wandering around garden mazes and helping ladybugs find their homes is not only fun, but educational and useful. This game stimulates your thinking and colour recognition skills, while at the same time providing lots of enjoyable entertainment.

title: Decorate House - Design Dream Home
description:
Enjoy Decorate House - Design Dream Home! that focus only on home makeover and decoration. Many free styles and furniture combinations await you in-game! Decorate each room of the house with a consistent vision and style that will make the home appeal to your target dream. Renovate, build extensions, then head off to auction. Its not the game that fuses colorful matching puzzle levels with a home you restore, Just design dreams. Don't forget to stop by your landlord or best friend's house to catch up and talk about your dream! Download now for free to design dream home!

Decorate House - Design Dream Home is a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. It’s quick, it’s fun and you can learn about diverse decor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

FEATURES:

* Best house flipper with smooth game-play
* Easy to use Controls
* Design Dream Home!
* Find fun fixers to flip
* Gorgeous 3D graphics Experience
* An excellent soundtrack will help you have a good time

Download now FOR FREE! to design dreams

title: Snow Digger Crane Master: Mini Construction Truck
description:
Build a giant snow fort with builder trucks and ice diggers! Pile up mountains of fresh snow with dump trucks, cranes and bulldozers in Snow Digger Crane Master. Decorate your fort, ice castle with dozens of Christmas holiday items to celebrate the winter season house construction. Choose from mighty machines and have fun in the snow all day playing home building simulator games for girls & boys! Snow Digger Crane Master lets you drive multiple construction trucks in heavy snow fall to make ice house, hut & fort. 

Play with cute little bear to drive gaming snow truck after filling it using different construction machines in Snow Digger Crane Master. This holiday season play the role of a builder, constructor & architect to show your house making engineering skills in the cold winter season. You have built many houses on the beach side as well as city but this task is huge like snow monster. Give the igloo a perfect makeover using different decoration items. You are the pro designer & decorator in this emergency mode to drive city bus vehicle on thick snow. Design and decorate brick by brick awesome igloo with your engineer art. 

Run your construction cranes like a digger dog to dig deep down bundles of snow to make ice home. Use trucks in Snow Digger Crane Master to create lovely snowy home. Dig snow, load it in the mini truck and deliver to the construction site. This monster truck driving simulator game will let you use your creative skills to build snow houses.

Snow Digger Crane Master Features:

-	Drive multiple dump trucks filled with snow
-	Build and decorate a super cool snow fort, house & igloo
-	Full of funny animations and silly surprises
-	Challenging snowy environment with holiday season

Download Snow Digger Crane Master, the best construction simulator game of 2018.

title: Merge Monsters – Evolution, Idle & Clicker Game
description:
Join the exciting journey of Merge Monsters – Match, Idle and Clicker Perfection and you will be wildly entertained. It is a game that mixes the best new features of matching games, connect games, idle games and clicker games in one!

title: Alchemy Rush
description:
Alchemical symbols, originally devised as part of alchemy, were used to denote some elements and some compounds until the 18th century.



There were often many symbols for an element. For a time, the astronomical symbols of the planets were used to denote the elements. However, as alchemists were persecuted, particularly in medieval times, secret symbols were invented. This led to a great deal of confusion, so you will find some overlap of symbols. The symbols were in common use through the 17th century; some are still in use today.



The alchemy symbols for earth, wind, fire, and water were fairly consistent (unlike those of the chemical elements). These symbols were used for "elements" into the 18th century, when alchemy gave way to chemistry and scientists learned more about the nature of matter.



The alchemy symbol for air or wind is an upright triangle with a horizontal bar. Plato also connected the qualities of wet and hot to the Air symbol. The symbol was associated with the colors blue or white or sometimes gray.



The alchemy symbol for fire looks like a flame or campfire. It's a simple triangle. According to Plato, the symbol also stands for hot and dry. It's associated with the colors red and orange. Fire was considered male or masculine.



The symbol for water is the opposite of the one for fire. It's an inverted triangle, which also resembles a cup or glass. Plato associated the symbol with the qualities wet and cold. The symbol was often drawn in blue or could refer to that color. Water was considered female or feminine.



The Philosopher's Stone could be represented by the squared circle. There are multiple ways to draw the glyph.



* List Of Alchemy Symbols.


- Sulfur Alchemy Symbol
- Mercury Alchemy Symbol
- Salt Alchemy Symbol
- Copper Alchemy Symbol
- Silver Alchemy Symbol
- Gold Alchemy Symbol
- Tin Alchemy Symbol
- Antimony Alchemy Symbol

title: Fliangle Free
description:
Fly a geometric bird to safety in this infinite flyer by avoiding oncoming barriers and the pink pulsing death ray that follows you closely behind.

It puts your thumb dexterity and endurance to the test to see how far you can make it before you crash... and you will crash. This is a simple game to play but a difficult one to master.

Do your best to achieve a high score then do your best to beat it!

******
This is our first game so please feel free to share your thoughts and feedback!

You can follow us on geekquiddity.com or through our various social media channels.

Thank you for playing!

title: Epic Battle Simulator
description:
This app is a Ancient accurate Battle Simulator.

In this battle simulator you have to choose between red team and blue team. Deploy the army and start this totally accurate battle simulator. You can choose different type of troops. The target of this game is to destroy enemies castles.

How to Play:
Every character has it’s own damage, health and minimal attack distance. This way you can make very strong, big creatures that only attack the castle and small, weak characters that attack everything on their way as well.
Characters look for the nearest enemy and attack it. Otherwise, if the enemy is out of range, they will attack the castle.

You can select a unit and deploy it in the battle arena. If you don’t have enough gold to deploy the unit, there’s a warning. You receive gold every 5 seconds and by killing enemies as well.

Troops Characters:
- Unarmed knight character
- Armed knight character
- Viking character
- Giant character
- Archer character
- Wizard + skeleton
- Robot
- Goblin
- Enemy archers
- Knight with shield
- Cavalry
- Goblin cavalry

title: Live for the Ding - free fun reaction game
description:
Just press Ding and don't press Dong in this hypercasual arcade reaction game. It's free to play and is ideal for time wasting in class, in the office or while commuting. It's the game you play between other games – an endless runner, but with buttons.

That thing you've been meaning to deal with that you just cannot face right now, put it off and lose yourself in Live for the Ding's graphically light, neutral interface. This perfect fast action kids game is great for the new school term - its quick gaming sessions are perfect time wasters between classes and the entertaining endless gameplay make it the ideal adult game for the daily commute.

Got insomnia? Its hypnotic and stress-inducing but also therapeutic tap style gameplay is great for helping you to zone out. Relax by playing in doctors' or dentists' waiting rooms or challenge friends to beat your new highest score.

The perfect time wasting game for kids during school holidays and half term and an addictive challenge for adults – it's non-stop rage quit fun for all the family. Everyone is equal, everyone faces the same simple challenge – from ages 5 to 95, it's a level playing field.

There's no player avatar, no bouncy ball, muscle-bound hero, super soldier or flapping bird, so there's no one to blame if you mess up – it's just you versus yourself as you test your reactions in this arcade action clicker and a high score to share via text message and social media. It neither courts, panders to, or cares for a single game-playing demographic.

There's no impossible increase in difficulty other than what pressure you put on yourself - If you can score one point you can score 10 and if you can score 10 you can score 100. Just relax, find your flow and enjoy the quick reflex endless tap tap gameplay - and no rage quitting - you can alway have just one more go.

So can you rise up and meet the Live for the Ding challenge?

It really is simple – just press Ding.

Features:
• Small download size – Don't waste your phone memory.
• Fast-paced, very hard but very simple gameplay.
• Neutral interface and minimalistic graphics.
• Achievement medals – Track your progress and impress your friends. Like they care.
• No internet or wi-fi connection required.
• No intrusive in-play ads – Well there are ads, but they're not intrusive.
• No in-game currency or micro-transactions.
• No skins, upgrades, characters or boosts to be bought.
• And no Pay-to-Win either.

title: Event Coordinator Wedding Planner
descriptionHTML:
Hello, we should enjoy every day and today we decided to make a very nice thing namely we invite you to a wedding. Today will not be just a guest but also will be the one who handles all the details for the newlyweds to have an unforgettable day. Through this bridal makeup game for girls you'll be able to have fun very well, you'll be able to prove that you are a responsible kid and you can even do your friends.

Here you'll be able to show that you have a highly developed organizational skills.
Success!

- The two young call their relatives and friends to announce that the wedding will take place soon;
- Then the two signs the contract to rent the restaurant;
- Emma wants a chocolate;
- You'll have to make a delicious chocolate;
- Add strawberries;
- They must choose the restaurant where the wedding will take place;
- The two have an important meeting and must be prepared;
- Help them choose the right clothes;
- They get in the car and go;
- Emma wants to choose a wedding dress;
- It looks in the catalog of dresses and then choose;
- Before any marriage the proposal it is a very important thing;
- You'll be witness an unforgettable moment and you'll see exactly how the Mike asks Emma to marry him and she accept it;
- Mike gives flowers and a gorgeous ring;
- They must make the invitations;
- They need: colored paper, colored pencils, glue and scissors. The bride and groom must write text and then send invitations by mail;
- Now you have to do cleaning at the restaurant;
- Collect garbage;
- Clean the floor;
- Wash windows;
- Arrange furniture;
- Decorate with flowers;
- Emma wants the most beautiful flowers, you must go to a florist and choose the most interesting flowers;
- The young bride needs a flawless makeup, apply: contact lenses, mascara, eyeshadow, lipstick and eyebrow pencil;
- Emma wants a delicious cake and decided to make it alone;
- Help Emma to make a wonderful cake;
- In a large bowl must add: milk, eggs, flour, salt and sugar. Mix well;

Hey Cooking Lovers!! We have come up with an awesome cooking game with an emotional story of Annie. This cafe shop game contains a variety of dishes to match with the customers' taste. title: Solitaire Royale
description:
Solitaire, also known as Klondike Solitaire or Patience, is the most popular single player card game in the world. If you like classic Solitaire, you're going to love this crisp and clear solitaire game!

Just move cards with a single tap or drag them to the destination. You can make full use of your brain to complete the classic game. If you like card game, Our Klondike Solitaire will give you endless fun. And the most important thing is that it is a single player card game and available for Free! 

Game Features:
♠ Draw 1 card (Easy) 
♠ Draw 3 cards (Hard) 
♠ Crisp, beautiful, and easy to read cards 
♠ Portrait display
♠ Efficient, fast, and sensible card games interface 
♠ Single tap to place a card or drag and drop 
♠ Standard  or  Vegas scoring 
♠ Smart hints show potentially useful moves 
♠ Timer, moves, and statistics 
♠ Unlimited Undo
♠ Auto-Complete option to finish a solved game 
♠ Play OFFLINE in anytime and anywhere.

title: Glow Balls
description:
Glow Balls is a series of games designed for kids. Interact with colored glowing spheres to accomplish various tasks. When a glow ball is touched it will change from dark to light or light to dark.
Use your finger to drag and "throw" glow balls accords the board.
Levels:
0-12 Months - Designed for young children to turn glow balls on or off. (Glow balls cannot be moved in this mode)

1 Year and Up - Designed for toddlers and older children to both turn glow balls on and off or "throw" glow balls around the board.

Rings - Get each glow ball into the matching ring. Bounce glow balls off other glow balls before getting them into the ring and you will earn more points.

Bricks - Use a glow ball to smash bricks (similar to brick breaker). The more bricks a glow ball smashes per "throw" the higher the points it earns. 

Spinner - A game with the same objective as Rings with the addition of a slow spinning wheel that you need to work around.

Special Items
Tap the '+' button in the levels it is available to watch a short video to earn a special item.
Golden Ball - This item gives significantly more points when used in rings or brick breaker. The golden ball can be placed into the yellow ring for a huge number of points!

Rocket - The rocket guides itself around the game destroying bricks or pushing around glow balls before exploding.

Fireball - Cuts through bricks without bouncing.

Settings
Free Play Balls - Set the number of balls that will be auto-generated in each level

Sound - Turns sound on or off for the game (great for kids who may play with your volume controls) This can completely disable sound for just the game.

Real-World Gravity - Turn this on to allow the balls to move according to how your device is tilted.

If you have any ideas on how to improve the game please let me know! If I like your idea I will add it to the feature list and release it in an update!

title: Best Braided Hairstyles For Girls
description:
The girls have arrived at the hair salon and they need you to braid their hair. Once you do their hair, they'll be ready for a big night out. It's up to you to decorate their hair with the latest fashion braiding styles and nice accessories. Follow the instructions to make sure that their hair gets braided neatly and professionally. Spend hours enjoying braiding hair and trying out different hairstyles just like a real stylist.

Features:
● Untangle the hair so that it is a lot easier for you to braid and make sure that you part the hair to get it ready to braid.
● Make the braided style from start to finish by carefully following the instructions.
● Make sure all of the hair is braided and don't miss any strands of hair so that the style looks neat and beautiful.
● When you're done with one style, try out the other options so that you can learn how to do different braiding styles just like a real stylist.

title: Sable's Grimoire - Demo (Visual Novel)
description:
*Note: This game is in landscape mode only.
The resolution is 1920x1080, but the game will work on lower or higher resolution screens.
Also, text is more comfortably read on larger devices, such as a 7-inch or bigger tablet. However, it is perfectly playable on a 5-inch phone screen.


The story:

When Sable is accepted into Amadronia Magic Academy, he believes that his dream of becoming a world-renowned magic researcher is finally within his grasp. As one of the few pure-blooded humans capable of using magic, Sable is hopeful that he’ll find common ground with the demi-human population at the school, and that the next few years of his life will be as productive as they are enlightening.

Unfortunately for Sable, his first day at Amadronia quickly proves to him that this will not be the case. The students in his class are unruly, there’s a pyromaniac dragon girl running around, his "teacher" has no interest in teaching, the principal wilfully breaks academy rules, and it seems like everywhere he turns, Sable finds one more reason to doubt Amadronia's proud legacy.

Will Sable manage to survive at this clearly dysfunctional academy? Or will he, like so many others, leave Amadronia feeling utterly disillusioned?
descriptionHTML:
*Note: This game is in landscape mode only.
The resolution is 1920x1080, but the game will work on lower or higher resolution screens.
Also, text is more comfortably read on larger devices, such as a 7-inch or bigger tablet. However, it is perfectly playable on a 5-inch phone screen.

As one of the few pure-blooded humans capable of using magic, Sable is hopeful that he’ll find common ground with the demi-human population at the school, and that the next few years of his life will be as productive as they are enlightening.

Unfortunately for Sable, his first day at Amadronia quickly proves to him that this will not be the case. The students in his class are unruly, there’s a pyromaniac dragon girl running around, his "teacher" has no interest in teaching, the principal wilfully breaks academy rules, and it seems like everywhere he turns, Sable finds one more reason to doubt Amadronia's proud legacy.

Will Sable manage to survive at this clearly dysfunctional academy? Or will he, like so many others, leave Amadronia feeling utterly disillusioned?
summary: An aspiring researcher attends a magic academy filled with monster girls

title: Herd Em Up
description:
An Unreal Engine 4 Animal Herding Game

Play as a medieval farmer who's animals can't seem to be contained within their pens. Lead them back into the pen to score points! A delightfully simple, low polygon 3D game.

Note: For some reason Unreal is requesting access to users' Contacts through a permission prompt. Feel free to deny this permission. I will never need access to a user's contacts so I will be trying to find out how to remove the prompt.

title: Blast Adventure: Explore and Collect Moments
description:
Match the cubes of the same color and combine boosters for huge explosions to blast your way through thousands of levels!

Go, explore!

Get ready to enjoy an infinite brain teaser game full of block blasting, challenging levels and winning!

Experience the greatest adventures through episodes in the most colorful lands of the Blast Adventure.

Adventure is a path.

⭕DESTROY ALL COLORED BLOCKS
The main mission in this awesome block matching game is to blast the blocks in order to win scores and levels. All you have to do in this tap and pop game is to touch a block that has at least one neighbor of the same color to destroy all of them. Blast as many blocks as you can to become the ultimate block match 2 game master of all time!

💯COMPLETE CHALLENGING LEVELS
There are hundreds of challenging and addictive levels in this amazing match game! Each block puzzle game level offers different goals and missions. You will start off with simple ones, but as you progress it will get harder and harder! Blast Adventure is a brain teaser game that tests your gaming skills, helps you block focus and wakes your mind up – all of that with hours of match 2 game fun!

⚡USE POWERFUL BOOSTERS
Although the time is limited in each level, this cool block matching game provides with powerful boosters that will help you out. Use horizontal bombs, vertical bombs, color bombs and dynamites to blast the blocks and to complete your goal! Use these special boosts to solve the match game puzzles before the time runs out!

🏆WATCH THE TIME & COMPLETE THE LEVELS WITH HIGHEST SCORES
The clock is ticking, you have to complete your level goal before the time runs out in this addictive color matching game! Complete as many levels as you can, win the highest scores and earn achievements. Collect coins to buy anything you need from the Coins Shop and have fun with the Wheel of Fortune to win even more coins.

Collect moments...

🎇BLAST ADVENTURE FEATURES
✔ Insanely addictive match 2 game
✔ Perfect for players of all ages
✔ Colorful & outstanding graphics
✔ Funky background music
✔ Easy-to-play interface
✔ Simple gameplay, hard to master
✔ Tap to blast 2 or more blocks of the same color
✔ Complete goals & level missions
✔ Tons of challenging levels
✔ Win scores, achievements & coins
✔ Spin the Wheel of Fortune for more coins
✔ FREE to play brain teaser game

Simply find out! Discovery! Explore places!

Download Blast Adventure now and enjoy hours of match game fun!

It’s absolutely FREE!

farm blast

Big fan of fruits puzzle game? Both of the design and program indicates that this is one of the best casual game. Match and switch 3,4,5 or more crops in the most dream farm. Join colorful matching adventure in farm blast and share the fun with all your friends and families! title: Summer High School Camping: Crazy Holiday Trip Fun
description:
Enjoy the great outdoors with your high school friends as they go on a trip adventure in Summer High School Camping. Help them pack their items in the house bedroom, pitch a tent in the ground, go fishing for their food, as well as cook, bake & grill and eat their meal under the sparkling starlit sky. Camping with your friends has never been this much fun! Go on your next outdoor adventure in Summer High School Camping. Fix your broken bus on the way to the camping location. Repair the broken engine & change the punctured tire to make your journey as smooth as possible. Cook delicious fish with your classmates & enjoy arranging picnic items on the sheet in Summer High School Camping.

Enjoy the outdoor adventure, discover activities crazy fun filled to fill your vacation book with beautiful camp builder memories. Start this camp fun by building tent for your fun filled bedtime and other wild activities. Explore the jungle to find & cut the trees, chop them to collect the woods. Use best builder and designer skills to construct the best camp home. Use iron rods and wood nails to build and fix the camp house. Now fix and repair all the broken windows and arrange the interior of the tent just like house fashion designer to give it best look in Summer High School Camping.

The winter camp & your vacation book is incomplete without bonfire and tasty chicken food in this camping simulator games for girls. Search the jungle for more woods to blow the campfire. Clean up your messy camping spot and set up the tent. When the tent is up, they can start with their crazy camping fun be decorating the interior with hiking set & carpet. Now it’s time to cook and bake delicious and yummy seafood dinner on the fire. Use top chef and cooking fish food mania skills for making and baking spicy fish. Baking food on a camp grill is a real challenge because here you don’t have the luxury of home kitchen. So little star chef bake most unique and awesome dishes and completes your cooking fever story. Bake fish properly on fire and enjoy eating it.

Summer High School Camping Features

-	Unpack the backpack and assemble the tent ready for camping.
-	Give her safety jacket and fishing rod then catch as many fish as you can.
-	Help them make a fire to keep them warm before getting ready to cook.
-	Prepare and cook the fish for a yummy camping treat.
-	Sit under the stars and eat an amazing meal while enjoying your camping trip with your friends

title: Kat Dealers
description:
Cats are famously known for returning with treats to their owners after a little walk!
Use Kat Dealers to send your cat on a fun mission and wait for his return with an incredible reward, get more cats and customize them with unique items to make them even more cute or sinister.
Collect exotic cat cards and show your friends who loves kittens the most!

Use your repeated cards to earn pennies.
See the evolution of your cats and your collection of cards, all with just a touch!

That's right, the perfect game for anyone who likes kittens, fun and cute cards of exotic cats!

Don’t be melodramatic about it, download it right now and make the most of your (future) kittens, don’t be shy.

description:
you love beauty & styling games, be sure to check this new dressup app for young fashionistas. There are 5 doll models on the screen for which you can select race, and then assemble millions of glam outfits from a huge wardrobe of luxurious, stylish apparel. The selection of garments is just amazing (these cuties know the best boutiques to shop at!), and you can style each character as an actress, movie star, a reality show superstar, celebrity model of the runway, a glamor red carpet socialite, or just a cute shopaholic chic with a millionaire dad and unlimited cash to spend.

Press the "camera" button when you've finished designing outfits, to grab a screenshot. Share with your friends on social networks to show off your talents as an outfit designer. Press "more games" to download and play more of our cosplay & salon apps for Android. All our makeover simulators are free, with no in-app purchases or locks. We've got many makeovers with glamour supermodels, celebrities, actresses and stars. Our games let you dream of being a famous supermodel of the podium, rising to the top charts of trendy fashion magazines. In each game, there are dozes of dresses, hairstyles, tops, skirts, accessories, shoes, jewelry, adorable pets, and much more. Design a unique look, pick a fancy hairstyle and put together an excellent combination of fitting clothing.

title: نلعب – تعال العب معي
description:
باعتباره التطبيق الاجتماعي الأكثر شعبية للشباب ، فقد جمعت نلعب عددا من الألعاب الكلاسيكية ومجهزة بواجهة جديدة ، يمكنك لعب هذه اللعبة مع أصدقائك
1. يلعب العاب
نحن نقوم بجمع عشرة من الألعاب الأكثر شعبية. ويمكنك لعب هذة الألعاب مع لاعبين من جميع أنحاء العالم في أي وقت وفي أي مكان. لا يوجد روبوت
2. لا إعلانات ، فقط للمتعة
لا يوجد أي شيء يمكن أن يؤثر على اللاعبين مثل الاعلانات و p2w. يمكنك تجربة الألعاب بسعاد ومرح. يجب عليك ان تتذاكر نتائجك عن طريق تسجيل الدخول الي حسابك
3. منافسة حقيقية
يمكن للاعبين أن يتطابقوا في نفس الوقت لكي يلعبون ويظههروا مهارتهم. وتنافس مع اصدقائك في اللعبة
4. استمع إلى صوت اللاعب
سيحب فريق نلعب سماع صوت اللاعب. إذا كان لديك أي تعليقات أو اقتراحات خلال تجربة نلعب ، أتمنى مخلصًا أن تتمكن من الاتصال بنا وإخبارنا برأيك في نلعب.
5. قائمة اللعبة

أربعة في الصف
هيكس محاربة
لعبة ريفيسي
خمسة في الصف
السرعة والغضب
كرة نطاطة
اقفز وأقفز
رحلة لا تنتهي
كرة السلة
برج خلفية
كسر الطوب

title: Color By Number - Poly Art Puzzle Game
description:
Life is like a rainbow, so full of beautiful colors and these colors are a source of power which directly influence your soul. Art establishes a deeper connection of a man’s body and soul, which makes us a better and a calmer human being. We at BACA BACA Games believes that coloring book games is a great therapy not only for mind but it also helps the soul in finding your peace. So, believing that we bring you yet another amazing and fabulous Low Poly Art Color By Number coloring game. Color By Number Poly Art Puzzle Game is specially designed and developed according to the theory of ” Coloring is therapy for both mind and soul.”  

Low Poly pixel art is not just a simple coloring pages game. It includes a lot of different concepts of color therapy like Low Poly art, Jigsaw Puzzle and the most important and unique one is Color by number. So ease your heart, your mind and your soul, just relax and release your anxiety. Color by number is a very unique concept in which you have to put images by number. Color by number is almost like a puzzle game but it is neither entirely a puzzle nor entirely a coloring game, it is a profound and perfect mixture of low poly art, color by number and jigsaw puzzle. 

Color By Number Poly Art Puzzle Game Play:
	BACA BACA Games offers you a very unique style of low poly color by number coloring book, where you have to put the right number of color to the same number of image. That is why this is called color by number. You have a lot of puzzles to solve with coloring. Choose beautiful polygon, you have to pick the right number part from the scroller and place it at the same number in the polygon image. First complete your polygon art jigsaw puzzle then share your master piece with your friends and family or save it in your mobile. 

Low Poly Art Color By Number Benefits:
•	Your brain experiences relief by entering a meditative state.
•	Stress and anxiety levels have the potential to be lowered.
•	Negative thoughts are expelled as you take in positivity.
•	Focusing on the present helps you achieve mindfulness.
•	Utilizing the technology promotes creation over consumption.
•	Coloring can be done by anyone, not just artists or creative types.
•	It’s a hobby that you can carry with you wherever you go.

Color By Number Poly Art Puzzle Game Features: 
•	Different and new style of coloring book.
•	A lot of low poly artworks waiting for you.
•	Profound mixture of Low poly coloring, puzzle game and color by number.
•	Easy, entertaining and interesting gameplay.
•	Amazing and High-Quality Graphics.
•	Beautiful and majestic low poly images to color.
•	Color therapy and anxiety relief packed in the game.
•	Best way to put your mind at ease.
•	Best app for all ages.
•	Totally free to download and play.

There was a study published in the Art Therapy: Journal of the American Art Therapy Association  22(2) pp. 81-85 provides support that coloring geometric patterns actually does help lower stress and anxiety levels. This study proves our point that coloring actually lowers your stress and anxiety levels.

So what are you waiting for, download and install Color By Number Poly Art Puzzle Game and forget your anxiety and stress and get relaxed.

title: Manga Girls Makeover - Dress up & Make up
description:
For all girls out there who love kawaii Japanese girls drawn in anime / manga style we have a new dressup game for Android! 

With 250+ items, 50 makeup elements and 8 backgrounds available free of charge and without any in-app purchases, you will be able to design a lot of outfits, for various occasions. Chibi princesses, high school schoolgirls in sailor-style uniforms, nerdy chicks in glasses, traditional kimonos and more. 

After you've decided upon the looks for each cute girl in the game, make a screenshot with the "Camera" button and then share it with your friends or save it in your personal collection.

We have more dress up / makeover games for young fashionistas. The games are all completely free, and nothing is locked behind in-app purchases.

title: Tap Tap Frog – Ultimate Jump!
description:
3,2,1, Fire!!
 
Climb to the top with the sticky elastic tongue!

"Tap Tap Frog" is a simple, yet fun tapping game. 
The sky is the limit! Climb as high as you can. See how high you can go!
Catch the flies to customize your frog!
Download now for free!

[How to play]
# There's an arrow revolving around the frog.
# Tap the arrow when it's aiming the target.
# Your frog will shoot its tongue as you tap.
# When the tongue reaches the target, it's a success! Your frog will pull itself up with its tongue.
# You must hurry and climb to the next location. If not, you'll fall off the cliff when the time is up!
# Be careful not to touch the ceiling with the tongue. When you hit the ceiling, it's over.




Developer's contacts：

www.yfactorysoft.com

title: Rock Star Makeover - Music Idol Girls
description:
Style a famous female singer in our new dressup/makeup game for young fashionista women. If you're into music industry, celebrity musicians and performers, follow the top bands and artists - and also love fashion & styling, this app is for you.

There are 8 backgrounds in the game which set the context: an audition, a concert on the stage, a world tour to meet the fans, a recording studio where superstars record their next album, cool night club street downtown, red carpet, and several experimental stages for an innovative modern performer.

Pick facial features and make-up options to create different looks for these celebrities. Choose a fancy hairstyle that fits the image of a rock musician and the tone of a band that publishes great songs for top labels and stays in the top charts. Design trendy outfits for the superstar dolls - from the large wardrobe of apparel you can put together varied styles: glam rock, pop star, rock and roll, blue / folk / country / raga / jazz rock, psychedelic / alternative / new wave / post-punk / indie / electronic / rap rock and many more. No matter which genre of popular modern music you like (heavy metal, techno-pop, garage-rock, grunge etc) or which subculture you're into (emo girl, goth, punk), you will find a corresponding outfit.

Download and try out more of our digital makeovers and beauty salon games for young fashionistas to play on an Android phone or tablet! Press "More games" button inside the application to see the list of cosplay and doll outfit designer apps.

description:
There are numerous ways to train your observational skills and thats why there are so many times of hidden object games. You may say that it is not matter what you do as long as you train but we have to agree that the diversity gives a bigger challenge. This is a free game in it, you will plunge into a fascinating journey through the mysterious places.

title: Helix: Glass Tower
description:
Break away from boredom with the most addictive way of smashing glass! A bouncing ball is your wrecking instrument and your mission is simple: destroy the glass platforms and avoid the orange areas to reach the tower bottom. Through the downfall, hit the glass cubes to earn precious time. 

Try to destroy as many glass rings as you can and behold the chaos you are causing! Your demolition journey starts now!

The easy-to-learn controls will attest that you have born to raise hell! Destroy more and more glass using addictive gameplay mechanics. 

You are in command. 
You rule the Helix: Glass Tower! 
You are the master of chaos!

title: World Food Chef Kitchen: Multiple Recipes Cooking
description:
World food chef kitchen game allow cooking games lovers a chance to cook and bake multiple dishes and desserts. Make your favorite yummy food with different recipes from world class cuisine experts and restaurants. Baking & making food dessert is much more fun with this unique baker and maker games. You can choose many food recipes from different continents and subcontinents like Asia, Africa, America, India and Europe. Unleash your fever to cook with madness and satisfy your restaurant frenzy. Enjoy virtual cooking simulator game and make many dishes from cookbook 2018.

 Restaurant Menu \ Cookbook Includes Following Dishes 

- Bake & decorate cake with creamy toppings. 
- Make lasagna pasta with cheese layer.
- Prepare eggs, bread, meat & sausage for breakfast.
- Cook delicious deep fried chicken wings
- Pizza baking with tasty extra toppings
- Make fast food burger like on stand. 
- Make veggies, chicken and corn soup.
- Cook Spaghetti noodles in hot water.
- Design tasty cupcake for events.
- Fill sushi with mouthwatering ingredients.
- Bake Donuts like bakery shop.
- Fill Turkey with rice & spices for thanksgiving meal. 
- Make apple pie in the oven.
- Top up waffle with ice cream, fruits & syrups.
- Prepare pancake for lunch & snack time.
-Best hot dog maker in the town.
- Make fresh fruity Ice Cream like parlor.
- Grilled steak & fries BBQ. 
- Spicy biryani for dinner.

This cooking simulator games for girls and boys also have seven mini games. Mini games includes card matching, shape matching, food packing, falling slime ball and few more games. You can earn coins by playing mini games and by completing cookery levels. You can unlock recipes with those coins. Enjoy this top girls games and best food maker games. Now play this world food chef in the kitchen game 2018 and have cool fun time.

title: Brazilian Wedding Salon - Bridal Makeovers
description:
Take the role of a personal VIP stylist for lucky Brazilian models who are marrying princes, millionaires and movie actors! This makeover game lets you dress up virtual dolls, select facial features and makeup, pick hairstyles, wedding dresses, veils and accessories. Over 250 clothing items and 60+ makeup options, 8 backgrounds and 8 handsome men from Brazil to choose from - a huge selection to let your fashionista fantasy flow. No locks, no in-app purchases - everything is completely free!

Do you also dream of the day when you'd marry a faboluously rich millionaire guy, move to an ocean-side villa in Latin America (e.g. near Rio) a live a crazy affluent life like you're made of money? With immense wealth, you could go on a shopping spree in classy fashion malls or glam boutiques for high class shoppers! Spend your morning at a gym, spa or joga class. During the day, give the inner shopaholic and shop until you drop in the celeb mall. Go to events in the evening, rubbing shoulders with celebrities, supermodels, actresses and the richest socialites on the red carpet.

Design a trendy bride outfit, then press "Camera" button to grab a screenshot. Share it with your girlfriends to show off your image designer skills. 

For more dressup apps for cosplay fans, press "More games" button - download them all to your Android phone or tablet and play for free, forever. Our new beauty & styling applications are the best for fashionistas of all ages: women, teenagers and girls alike. In our apps you can dress-up a top model, a super-star, a celebrity or a princess in all kinds of fashionable apparel.

Dreaming of becoming a glamour supermodel, reality show superstar or a famous actress, pop singer or fashion blogging idol? Then you need to get knowledgeable in fashion trends and develop a great sense of style before you become that status shopper in an elite boutique. While you future multimilionaire actor husband is on his way to find you, get ready for the luxury life by creating fancy doll looks and amazing girl outfits from luxurious garments.

title: Jelly Mania Pop Blast
description:
Jelly Mania Pop Blast: All new connecting Jelly Mania Pop Blast Match 3 Game. Start the colorful Jelly Mania Pop Blast journey in this jelly mania kingdom and relax with fun entertainment and sweet surprises at every level.

blast the jell by connecting three or more matching items. Connect as many of the same jellies in one touch and make the longest line to open sweet surprises that help you complete game levels quickly and generate more Candy stars. The more jellies you explode on a line, the more adventures you enjoy!

Tips for overcoming obstacles Games of Jelly Mania Pop Blast:
Chain block: Break strategically and move to the next level.
Wooden Blocks: Erase tactically that comes in your game and get a high score.
Water Jelly: Destroy and pop them with your magical connecting skills.
Black Jellies: Quickly blow them, before they produce more.

Rotate the magic wheel of Jelly Mania Pop Blast and get a chance to collect various bomb strengths, boosters, extra movements and Jelly strength. This power amplifier supports you to play games to complete challenging levels. Get three stars on each level and become a king in the world of Jelly.


GAME FEATURES:
- RATES PLAY
- Beautiful and sharp eye-catching graphics
- 500 strategically planned levels of interesting Jelly Blast Mania World.
- FREE to play and in-app purchases to get additional power-ups.
- Compatible with most smartphones and tablets.
- Power-ups and magic boosters to help you complete challenging levels.
- Integrated with Google Play Achievements and Boards.

title: Talking Ghost 2
description:
🦇🌕🕯️Welcome to a spooky world and meet funny creature, the talking ghost! If you are looking for a new virtual friend, then search no more, because this one is the best for fearless children like you! It's definitely different than others too, so if you want to stand out from the rest, you have found perfect game for yourself. The newest 👻Talking Ghost 2👻 brings so many cool things your way, and you will be entertained for hours once you start playing this amazing game. There are so many things for you to do, and you won't be able to stop laughing when you see all of the things that your virtual friend does. Who says that ghosts are popular only on Halloween? Now you can be part of a scary world every day thanks to this cool talking game. All you have to do in order to get it on your phone is to press the install button, so download free 👻Talking Ghost 2👻 game today and have fun!
 
Instructions: 
- Say something and Ghost will repeat after you
- Play mini games, puzzles and more to earn coins
- Buy clothes for Ghost and change his house
- Unlock all of the rooms
 
🦇🌕🕯️The latest 👻Talking Ghost 2👻 will quickly become your favorite game and you won't be able to stop playing it. A lot of levels are waiting for you, but you will have to unlock them first before you can use them. In order to do so, you will have to take care of your virtual friend, and you will need to collect enough coins so you could buy clothes and items for living room, bathroom, bedroom, and the rest. This top game offers so many things, and you will get desire to try all of them. Go ahead and do so, but you will have to unlock all of the levels! As you take care of the Ghost, he will become your best friend and you won't be able to pass a day without hanging out with him. Talk to him as much as you want and hear him repeating your words, and then show him that you love him by not letting him be hungry or sad. We have prepared prize wheel for you which will enable you to win coins and potions for your virtual friend, so make sure that he has everything he needs and take good care of him. 
 
🦇🌕🕯️If the Ghost is not satisfied, he will show you that by making certain gestures. For example, if he is hungry, he will make a sad face and he will rub his belly. If you don't have enough food in the kitchen, go to a store and buy what is necessary. Also, if you haven't brushed his teeth in a while, he will blow into the screen of your smartphone or tablet and it will turn green! This can be funny for sure, but don't let your virtual friend be dirty. The latest 👻Talking Ghost 2👻 will teach you how to be responsible and you will feel as if he is your buddy for real. When you collect enough money, you will be able to buy clothes for him, and every time you change his outfit, he will be thrilled. Also, he will show you that he is happy when you change something in his house, and when you upgrade to the next level. You will need to make sure that he gets enough sleep too, so put him to bed when he becomes too tired, and let him rest. You will need to wait until he gets enough rest, and if you are impatient, then watch a video and skip sleeping. This popular game will entertain both kids and adults, so it doesn't matter how old you are, the newest 👻Talking Ghost 2👻 is waiting for you! The best part is that it is completely free of charge, so download it today and get to meet a spooky guy.

title: Pretend My City Hospital: Town Doctor Story Games
description:
Pretend my city hospital is a doctor clinic game where you can pretend play in virtual hospital and can arrange, manage stuff and buy snacks, medicine and dress up staff and patients. In this imaginative open ended role play game you can play as doctor, nurse, patients and other staff member. Roam around in the hospital rooms to explore different departments and labs. Do patients body different medical tests like x-ray and MRI in radiology lab. If you like pretend games like airport, shopping mall, supermarket, school and dollhouse then you will love this hospital role play game for girls and boys.

Little boys and girls like to enjoy their free time in family home, playground and amusement parks But to have unique entertaining time, Let’s have fun in town crazy hospital. Explore the open world game play by visiting clinic reception, lobby, patient wards and experiment labs. Arrange, manage and complete creative activities in each room as you like. Dump trash, dress up character as you wish. Make and create your own avatar as you like it to be. 

You can take appointments from reception and then can visit the doctor. Change bed sheets and patients clothes from multiple selection. Prepare healthy diet for patients and feed them. Feeling hungry no worries! Explore the open cafeteria in the hospital. Grab snacks, fast food and fruits to eat. 

In this pretend play games for boys and girls you can perform complete body test of patients with many entertaining duties. Pretend my city hospital is the best ASMR game with oddly satisfying game play. Now play this fun town game and have fun time.

title: The BIG Question – the cash giveaway quiz
description:
The BIG Question is a simple game.
We will ask you just one question each and every day. You and the rest of the world will answer this question. On the following day whoever picks the answer with the most votes will collect the most rewards. Collect enough rewards to enter our weekly cash prize competition.

The BIG Question is free to play and takes just a few seconds per day to play. 

Check out our Facebook page for discussions on the latest BIG Questions: https://www.facebook.com/theBIGquestionGAME
 
Prepare yourself for an exploration of the deepest and most profound subjects, such as:
•	What's life really all about?
•	What is President Trump's probable weight?
•	Who is the better Marvel superhero?
•	Is religion good or bad for children?
•	Why do birds suddenly appear?
•	How many drinks are reasonable on a night out?
•	What is the point of wasps?

description:
Hey girls! If you love the show Ever After High we have an amazing new "games for girl" game for you called Apple White's Baby Dragon.
 In this wonderful and fun game, Apple White's magical dragon egg has hatched to reveal her cute, new baby dragon. We all know how dragons are majestic, magical creatures and Apple White's is no different.
 She is anxious to find out what magic powers her dragon holds so we thought you might have fun helping her discover them. 
 Play this beautiful game which is designed for girlsgogames, discover the powers of the dragon by mixing together four items at a time to create a potion.
 
 Baby dragons need lots of LOVE and attention, You will have a frog, a key, books, a mirror, roses and apples and also things like slugs, a sock or a broken clock and many more.
 Mix four at a time and unlock the powers of the dragon. Use your imagination and pair the ingredients as creatively as possible.

title: Farm Scapes
description:
Get the complete Let's Farm Frenzy experience with our Let's Farm Frenzy game. Build your own farming empire. Let's Farm Frenzy drops you into a highly imaginative environment which will give you a magnificent impression of a Family Farm Frenzy Homescapes! Level up to unlock the absolutely unique goods Township Gardenscapes!

Let's Farm in Funky Bay Frenzy Farming your goal is to build up a great hay day farming business and become rich by doing so. Harvest crops, Township, upgrade your equipment, and become the most successful farmer Township! You just put on your old boots and start working Gardenscapes. There is plenty to do at Family Farm Frenzy Homescapes FarmVille.

Your role in Farm Frenzy Gardenscapes is a farmer hay day and your job will be to cultivate the land. You can harvest different types of crops, apart from growing crops you also need to take good care of FarmVille livestock.

Get ready to complete 10 challenging levels Gardenscapes with more coming soon and upgrade your farm in order to reap more Let's Farm Story. 


GAME FEATURES:
> 10+ Original FarmVille levels 
> Funny animals to care for!
> Lots of farm products to sell 
> Over 30 buildings' upgrades!
> Unlimited game time
> Awesome hay day bonuses
> Brilliant graphics and nice soundtrack

title: Filipino Anime Girls - Philippines Fashion
description:
This new dress-up and beauty app will surely be enjoyed by young otaku fashionistas who loves to style their favorite Filipina Virtual dolls! Drawn in beautiful manga and anime style, create that beautiful, kawaii and super-cute schoolgirl look for Animatronic Filipino characters from literally hundreds of trendy modern Filipina outfits, accessories, hairstyles and accessories. 

Choose from fashionable garments. Customize dresses, tops, skirts, shoes, jackets, leggings, shorts, socks and even give your cute characters adorable pets for different occasions! Improve your sense of style and fashion in our girl games by fitting together clothes into awesome looks: traditional, fancy, trendy, classy, casual, adventurous or sweet.  Use your inner fashionista and style them in their schoolgirl outfits, give her an awesome makeover and then pose her in 3 high-detailed backgrounds inspired by beautiful settings in the Philippines. When you’ve completed your doll’s styling, press the “Camera” button to create a screenshot. Upload to social networks to show off your talent to your friends.

If you love other countries like Japan, cartoonish anime graphics, chibi princesses and creating gorgeous makeovers, press “More games” button inside the game to download and play more of our fabulous cosplay, salon and dressing games. Our makeovers and outfit designer apps are loved by millions of players in the world.

title: Verdad o Reto
description:
Verdad o Reto

Las preguntas más inquietantes e incómodas de contestar, y los mejores retos que podrás encontrar en una sola aplicación.

Elije entre responder una pregunta con toda sinceridad o cumplir con los retos y desafíos mas extremos para encender la fiesta.


★ 3 modos de juego diferentes ★

Aplicación de la Verdad y el Desafío para los niños

La verdad y la aplicación de desafío para los adolescentes

Aplicación de Verdad y Desafío para Adultos



★ Recursos ★

✔ Miles de preguntas sobre la Verdad y el valor
✔ Añada sus propios desafíos limpios o sucios en la aplicación!
✔ Establezca los nombres de los jugadores: perfecto para grandes grupos y fiestas.
✔ Actualizado con frecuencia con más contenido
✔ Juega con hasta 15 jugadores
✔ Completamente gratis para jugar
✔ Acompañe a quien está ganando con un marcador exhibido después de cada ronda
✔ 3 modos de juego diferentes: niños, adolescentes y adultos (18+)




★ Caracteristicas ★

✔ Gira la botella
✔ Cientos de preguntas sobre la Verdad y el Audaz
✔ Agregue sus propios desafíos limpios o sucios en la aplicación!
✔ Establecer los nombres de los jugadores: perfecto para grandes grupos y fiestas.
✔ Girar la característica de botella hacer el juego más singular
✔ Actualizado frecuentemente con más contenido
✔ Juega con hasta 15 jugadores
✔ Mantenga un registro de quién está ganando con un marcador mostrado
✔ Completamente gratis para jugar
✔ Se requieren un mínimo de 2 jugadores
✔ Crea tus propias preguntas personalizadas de verdad o desafío.
✔ Verdad y desafío aplicación fuera de línea para jugar
✔ Función de activación / desactivación del sonido
✔ Juegos de pareja
✔ Awesome scoreboard UI
✔ DIVERSIÓN! Y entretenido
✔ 3 modos de juego diferentes: niños, adolescentes y adultos (18+)


SCORE SYSTEM

title: High School Girls Home Cleaning: Room Makeover Sim
description:
Mom cleanup and wash house everyday with her busy routine! High school girls it’s your turn to help and take care of mommy on weekend holidays. Take hold on housekeeper and cleaner activities to makeover and fix it house. The house rooms are messed up, full of trash and dusty spots on furniture, closets and kitchen shelves. Little princess learn the best ways and hacks for cleaning and washing home stuff. Now play this high school girls home cleaning games and enjoy virtual simulator of fixing and repairing rooms.

This room service game allow you to makeover and wash rooms including kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. Each room is facing different types of cleaning and washing challenges. Work like hotel room service maid to arrange all home rooms like pro. Use cleaner tools like mop, brush, sponge, soap, sweeper and dustpan. Sweep bedroom floor, use vacuum on carpet, broom for cleaning web and manage stuff on right places. Open and clean clothes and shoes closet. 

Learn how to wash home kitchen stove, shelves , dish, cabinets and others utensils. Remove rust and oil spots from stove using liquid cleaner. Start dish washing, make sink tidy and design the kitchen interior. Wash toilet’s bathtub, seat, sink and floor with cleaner to shine it up. Complete all learning and fun entertainment activities to make your mommy happy. This high school girls home cleaning game is for all boys and girls who like hotel, dollhouse, playground or castle makeover and decoration games. 

Clean, design and decorate your princess house with special care and have fun time!

title: Witty.io - Snake Slithering Superhero Game
description:
Witty.io - Snake Slithering Superhero Game !
Witty.io - Snake Slithering  is The most popular games in play store, slither your snake game and play online now, one of the most funny 
cool mobile game where snakes Slither are the main worm heroes. It’s far from classic snake experience, it’s an adventure arcade game, the main aim is to choose your favorite slither skin and play with crawling snake IO trying to become the longest worm IO player.

Witty.io - Snake Slithering -Experience new way of Slithering with your favorite Snake Worm. You will take a role of snaek io slither reptile whose main goal is to grow by eating dots. Venom Worm crawling becomes much funnier! Slither Worm io will help you to reach this goal and will follow your commands. Slither Snake IO is an addictive arcade game, be careful! Check out leaderboard of best slither players and compete with them by choosing snake worm.

A single mistake is enough to make a giant worm turn into nothing and lead to game over, even against the smallest slither worm, granting this latter a chance of becoming stronger and faster without effort. Focus on the luminous stars and planets along the milky way, forget about the others except when you are big enough to trap them in circles. Note that it’s possible to cross ways with your own tail, without dying.

How to play?
- Control your little worm to eat all kinds of little points,Grow into a larger snake!
- Adjust the snake speed, design your opponents and absorb their energy balls
- Destroy many worm and get higher scores
- Snatch more territory and enjoy the thrill of full-screen impact!

Share Mobile Snake Slither Online game with your friends, earn gold and buy new sneak skins.
You can download this cool snake game completely free! This is one of the best slither mods ever!
We don’t allow slither hacks or snake cheats! 


====================================
Support Information: 
For additional support, please contact: 
E-mail : mobi099@gmail.com
====================================

title: Little Policeman - Tiny Cops Police Station
description:
Are you ready to act as a real detective? Dress-up the police in best police uniform, Pack their bags with helmet, handcuff, whistle, walkie talkie. Get the police car ready to race with the escaped criminals... Be the best police officer in the town.

Features:
- A game including many mini games involving the policemen and police station !
- Lots of mini games with unsolved cases waiting for you to get them solved. 
- Analyze the cases and hunt down the criminals.
- Learn police equipment: handcuffs, siren, radio and many more
- Develop role playing skills and become a real police hero! 
- Develop decision making by engaging  you in fun and realistic activities.
- Learn to run and manage your own Police Station

Be not afraid of the difficulties and dangers you face as a policeman. Just focus and try to triumph of justice. Help the civilians suffering from disasters. Help find their missing items, catch the criminals, take part in the race to catch them, and much more.

title: Gothic Lolita Fashion
description:
This new dress up and makeover game inspired by Japanese Lolita culture, a merge of dark goth with doll-like sweetness, enables you to design your own Gothic Lolita style. Using gorgeous Edwardian blouses, glamorous gothica clothes & outfits, Victorian dresses, intricate accessories, kawaii hairstyles, and more to create your own teenage Lolita fashionista.

Give her a dramatic salon makeover with a variety of makeup looks, hair, and eye colors. Pick from Harajuku beauty bags to fancy parasols, and re-design her look with black, red and white fashion lace combos. Choose between backgrounds of cute cherry blossom scenery to sophisticated room interiors that will set about the mood for your loligoth girl.

Free cosplay game about drama, sadness and young cuties to download & play for Android, with no in-app purchases or locks. Teenagers will love becoming the designer and stylist of one of Japan’s many popular street fashions.

title: Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef
description:
Are you a big fan of casual games such as restaurant games, kitchen games and serving delicious dishes to hungry customers in amazing restaurants? If you got caught by the cooking fever too. Then Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef is the cooking game for you! 


Have fun as cooking chef to prepare orders fast. The fast paced time management game will bring out your fever to cook as the crazy chef. Time management, accuracy, fast paced order serving and delicious breakfast cooking. The Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef revolves inside a kitchen filled with multiple items to test your cooking skills. Compete against top crazy chef of the world to let the customers enjoy your delicious cuisines. The fever to cook is back now! Challenge other crazy chef all over the world to set high scores. Build your career as the perfect cooking chef inside the luxury kitchen and serve hungry customers. Give them complimentary juices or may be a cup of coffee. 

Cook & Serve hungry customers in many fancy restaurants! Get ready to become the best cooking chef in every kitchen that this game has to offer! 

Manage restaurants located all over the🌴 tropical islands. ☀️ You’ll be feeling like a dashing restaurant manager! Not to mention the special kitchenware that makes you the greatest digital chef in this Cooking Story Madness:  Travel of Crazy Chef food game.


Do you have what it takes to be the cooking chef master? Serve meals in breakfast, lunch and dinner to the hungry diners. Portray your skills as the kitchen cooking chef in this additive time management game with fast paced cooking management. Cook, serve and Enjoy Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef.

Serve best cuisine, earn yourself a big fortune. Take this cooking adventure, become a top chef in the world! Enjoy cooking and running kitchens on your own!

Run the famous restaurants, cook the delicious food and deserts from all over the world, Serve demanding customers, show your stuff and feed the hungry stomachs, help the girl's chef dream come true!

Become the master chef 👨🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef is highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience! 


Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! Try all the possible kitchen appliances 🍳 to improve your cooking abilities. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware for a better gaming experience of Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef!


◆◆◆ WHAT’S INSIDE  Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef ◆◆◆
► Multiple Items to Cook n serve to Customers
► Face-Paced Game with Time Management
► Cooking Chef Skills & Kitchen Environment
► Run your own Restaurant & Serve Customers
► Post High Scores on Leaderboard 



◆◆◆ YOU ARE SWEET ◆◆◆
Your suggestions & feedback are valuable to help us keep working on new concepts. If you like our games, please feel free to rate and review so we can always provide you with quality free games.
Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management. There will be a lot of levels loaded with enough orders for you to enjoy🍸and even more to come. So put your chef hat on and start cooking! 🍯


◆◆◆ DISCLAIMER ◆◆◆
This app is ad supported and may contain ads.

Download Cooking Story Madness :  Travel of Crazy Chef Adventure Now

Hit that download button now!

title: Falcons Gameday
description:
Play along on gamedays in Atlanta or use Falcons fan filters anywhere!  With Falcons Gameday you can play along with the games on the big screen at Mercedes-Benz Stadium!  When you're not playing games or you're away from the stadium, use the Falcons Fan Filter in the app to take pictures with helmets, mascots, and face paints to share with your friends on social media.

Now you can experience Falcons Gameday like never before!

title: Dungeon Construction Co. Mobile
description:
Are you a team player? Do you have experience with ancient eldritch horrors? Need to make a little gold to support a mana addiction? Come work for Dungeon Construction Co.! We currently have an opening in our dungeon running a focus group.
You will be generously compensated with EXPOSURE and EXPERIENCE POINTS! Also, due to the recent high intern [death]* rate, there are lots of opportunities for advancement.

Dungeon Construction Co.: We build adventure!

From the participation-award-winning comic creators of Dungeon Construction Co. (whose moms love them very much), and a guy who made a game once with cats and tacos in it, comes the okayest game you’ve played since you installed [insert RPG title]** on your grandma’s heart monitor.

Featuring: 
 - 10 exciting levels of ever-increasing danger. Can you make it through the dungeon?
 - A bonus Endless Mini-game
 - Collectible HATS (you know you love hats)
 - All ads offer a reward!
 - Hate ads? You can opt to remove non-optional ads
 - 73% more Capybaras than the leading dungeon runner

* remove "death" add "turnover" ~ Tedward
** I don't care Wizard, put whatever hot RPG the kids play ~ Tedward

title: Carte Creative Destruction
description:
Carte Creative Destruction is a game that is both enjoyable and challenging since it requires one to look for strategies and ways in order to win.

Carte creative destruction is a addictive and popular card game of tricks, trumps and bidding which is a strategy board game 4 players and is being widely played in India, Nepal, Algeria, morrocco, russia , united state, canada,  and many Asian, Latin, European countries

CHARACTERISTICS:

-	User and CPU players
-	Fits in all phones and tablets
-	Supports all screen sizes
-	Suitable for all level games players
-	Help and hints available
-	Simple UI Design and easy settings
-	Very fun and easy to play
-	Great option for time pass
-	Best logical CPU players
-	Call bridge online

ABOUT :

-	This allows them to get 100 points which otherwise could have been lost if the partner played a smaller card.

-	There is the individual spade game and cut throat that is played by a single player and this is perfect for those who do not want partners.

-	 This is considered one of the most challenging card games of all time and this is mainly because it is usually played with a partner and one does not know the cards that the partner is holding. This makes it extremely difficult to win more so if there is no connection between the two and if one of them does not have the tips for playing spades .

-	This is most delicate when partners are playing since the partners have to estimate wining tricks not only for themselves but for their partners as well.

-	It is important to know the best spades tips so as to win the game since it requires a lot of strategies and at times it also includes guessing. It is important to ensure that when a partner bets nil then the other partner should bet with a higher card so as to back up their partner. 

If there is a problem with the game, do not forget to email us or leave your comments in the comments box.

title: Cruise Director 4
description:
As Cruise Director in charge, enjoy a truly sensational Cruise of a Lifetime aboard the fleet’s super luxurious flagship, USS Liberty of the Waves. 

Arrange fabulous excursions in the Caribbean, Europe, Mid East and Asia. Visit famous tourist Sights and Landmarks in cities such as London, Venice and Monte Carlo. Enjoy Pacific and Atlantic highlights, spend a while relaxing in the Seychelles and Maldive Islands. Travel across mainland China to see the Terracotta Army, transit the Suez Canal. Help passengers with Cabins, Shopping, Dining, Leisure on ship and at Ports of Call along the way. 

Collect Souvenirs of the cruise. Look for hundreds of hidden objects, items Lost by Passengers, Trash for Recycling. Play superb Mini-Games. earn Merit Badges for your Achievements. Vacation Adventures : Cruise Director 4 guarantees truly captivating, hour upon hour gameplay for Families and All ages to enjoy.

title: Farm Escape 2018
description:
You have to play a farmer, which was closed by animals in a warehouse with hay. You will be provided with tools to make an escape from the agricultural warehouse. A lot of different escape options are waiting for you, but only two successful options will help you get out of the farm. On the way, you are in danger, for example, animal horse, pig, sheep, horse and many other animals. Also in the game will be bandits, military, doctor and civilian, who will also bring you additional problems. You will find various transport, a tractor, a wheelbarrow, flying aids. You do not have to plant vegetables and fruits in the garden, you will have a grandiose escape from the farm! You can go down into the dungeon and find zombies and spiders. Quickly, take a fork, shovel and run away from the farm!
Interesting and free game for any age.

title: Pikachu Evolution - Connect Animal
description:
Classic Pikachu 2018 - a legendary game since 2003 now has been revived with classic graphic and 2 mode: 

1. Classic mode (13 levels)
2. New mode (80 levels)

Pikachu is a memory training game, I practice memory, suitable for those who want to challenge. Especially attractive to those who love the classic Pikachu game. Pikachu Memory is also suitable for children to learn, practice memory. It is interesting that children can play and can learn right?

FEATURES:
★ Pikachu animal
★ 2 Theme: Animal - Food
★ 2 Mode: Classic pikachu & New mode (very hard)
★ Support: Hint & Refresh
★ Memory training: Full HD Graphics
★ Diamond: Support for all phones and tablets.
★ Fruit Cut: Many new levels are harder, more attractive.


HOW TO PLAY Onet Connect Animal ?
✓ Remove 2 animal with the same kind which can be connected within 3 lines. 
✓ Remove all animals before time up. 
✓ Attend to number at top left corner: LIVE, when there is no pair on the board, all animals will change position and LIVE will be reduced by 1. 
✓ The next door will be difficult, you have pass it

Have fun of playing Pikachu Onet Connect Animal!
